# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-104">敏感信息类型属性定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-105">合规性中心 (DLP) 中的数据丢失防护包括许多准备好在 DLP 策略中使用的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-106">本文列出了所有这些敏感信息类型，并显示了 DLP 策略在检测到每种类型时查找的信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-106">This article lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-107">敏感信息类型通过正则表达式或函数可以识别的模式定义。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-107">A sensitive information type is defined by a pattern that can be identified by a regular expression or a function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-108">确定证据（如关键字和校验和）可用于标识敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-108">Corroborative evidence, like keywords and checksums, can be used to identify a sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-109">可信度和相似度也会在评估过程中使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-109">Confidence level and proximity are also used in the evaluation process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-110">敏感信息类型需要以下订阅之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-110">Sensitive information types require one of these subscriptions:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-113">敏感信息类型用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-113">Sensitive information types are used in:</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-114">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-114">Data loss prevention policies</span></span>](data-loss-prevention-policies.md) 
- [<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-115">敏感度标签</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-115">Sensitivity labels</span></span>](sensitivity-labels.md)
- [<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-116">保留标签</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-116">Retention labels</span></span>](retention.md)
- [<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-117">通信合规性</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-117">Communication compliance</span></span>](communication-compliance.md)
- [<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-118">自动标记策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-118">Auto-labelling policies</span></span>](apply-sensitivity-label-automatically.md#how-to-configure-auto-labeling-for-office-apps)

## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-119">ABA 路由号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-119">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-120">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-120">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-121">9 个数字，可能采用格式化或无格式模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-121">nine digits that may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-122">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-122">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-123">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-123">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-124">四个数字，以 0、1、2、3、6、7 或 8 开头</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-124">four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-125">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-125">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-126">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-126">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-127">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-127">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-128">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-128">a digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-129">无格式：九个以 0、1、2、3、6、7 或 8 开头的连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-129">Unformatted: nine consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-130">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-130">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-131">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-131">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-132">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-132">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-133">如果策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则策略具有中等可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-133">A policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-134">函数 Func_aba_routing 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-134">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-135">找到 Keyword_ABA_Routing 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-135">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-136">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其可信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-136">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-137">函数 Func_aba_routing 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-137">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- ABA Routing Number -->
    <Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_aba_routing"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-139">Keyword_aba_routing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-139">Keyword_aba_routing</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-140">aba number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-140">aba number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-141">aba#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-141">aba#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-142">aba</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-142">aba</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-143">abarouting#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-143">abarouting#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-144">abaroutingnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-144">abaroutingnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-145">americanbankassociationrouting#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-145">americanbankassociationrouting#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-146">americanbankassociationroutingnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-146">americanbankassociationroutingnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-147">bankrouting#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-147">bankrouting#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-148">bankroutingnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-148">bankroutingnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-149">routing#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-149">routing #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-150">路由否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-150">routing no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-151">路由号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-151">routing number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-152">routing transit number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-152">routing transit number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-153">routing#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-153">routing#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-154">RTN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-154">RTN</span></span>


## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-155">阿根廷国家/ (DNI) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-155">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-156">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-156">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-157">带或不带句号的八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-157">Eight digits with or without periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-158">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-158">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-159">八个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-159">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-160">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-160">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-161">可选时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-161">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-162">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-162">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-163">可选时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-163">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-164">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-164">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-165">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-165">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-166">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-166">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-167">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-167">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-168">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-168">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-169">正则表达式 Regex_argentina_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-169">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-170">找到 Keyword_argentina_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-170">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_argentina_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-172">Keyword_argentina_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-172">Keyword_argentina_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-175">cédula</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-175">cédula</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-176">dni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-176">dni</span></span>

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-182">澳大利亚银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-182">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-183">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-183">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-184">6 到 10 个数字，带或不带银行省/市/县分支机构号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-184">six to ten digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-185">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-185">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-186">帐号为 6 到 10 位数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-186">Account number is 6 to 10 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-187">澳大利亚银行州级分部编号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-187">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-188">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-188">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-189">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-189">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-190">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-190">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-191">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-191">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-192">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-192">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-193">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-193">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-194">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-194">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-195">正则表达式Regex_australia_bank_account_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-195">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-196">找到 Keyword_australia_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-196">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-197">正则表达式 Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-197">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-198">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-198">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-199">正则表达式Regex_australia_bank_account_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-199">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-200">找到 Keyword_australia_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-200">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-201">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-201">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_australia_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-202">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-202">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-203">swift bank code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-203">swift bank code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-204">correspondent bank</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-204">correspondent bank</span></span>

## <a name="australia-business-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-216">澳大利亚商务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-216">Australia business number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-217">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-217">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-218">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-218">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-219">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-219">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-220">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-220">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-221">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-221">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-222">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-222">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-223">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-223">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-224">包含可选分隔符的 11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-224">11 digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-225">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-225">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-226">带可选分隔符的 11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-226">11 digits with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-227">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-227">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-228">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-228">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-229">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-229">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-230">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-230">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-231">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-231">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-232">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-232">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-233">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-233">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-234">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-234">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-235">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-235">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-236">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-236">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-237">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-237">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-238">函数Func_australian_business_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-238">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-239">找到来自Keywords_australian_business_number的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-239">A keyword from Keywords_australian_business_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-240">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-240">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-241">函数Func_australian_business_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-241">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Business Number -->
      <Entity id="76e83b3b-01ee-4530-aced-e667a6609f49" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-244">australia business no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-244">australia business no</span></span>

## <a name="australia-company-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-251">澳大利亚公司编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-251">Australia company number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-252">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-252">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-253">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-253">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-254">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-254">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-255">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-255">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-256">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-256">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-257">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-257">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-258">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-258">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-259">带分隔符的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-259">nine digits with delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-260">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-260">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-261">带分隔符的九个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-261">nine digits with delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-262">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-262">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-263">空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-263">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-264">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-264">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-265">空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-265">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-266">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-266">three digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-267">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-267">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-268">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-268">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-269">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-269">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-270">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-270">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-271">函数Func_Australian_Company_Number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-271">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-272">找到来自Keyword_Australian_Company_Number的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-272">A keyword from Keyword_Australian_Company_Number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-273">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其可信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-273">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-274">函数Func_Australian_Company_Number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-274">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Company Number -->
      <Entity id="b1fba4f7-7b3e-4bb9-8f9a-9366df604dbb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-275">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-275">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_australia_company_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-276">Keyword_australia_company_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-276">Keyword_australia_company_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-277">can</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-277">acn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-278">澳大利亚公司否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-278">australia company no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-279">澳大利亚公司否#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-279">australia company no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-280">澳大利亚公司编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-280">australia company number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-281">澳大利亚公司 no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-281">australian company no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-282">澳大利亚公司 no#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-282">australian company no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-283">澳大利亚公司编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-283">australian company number</span></span>

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-284">澳大利亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-284">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-285">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-285">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-286">九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-286">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-287">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-287">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-288">九个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-288">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-289">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-289">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-290">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-290">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-291">五个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-291">five digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-292">或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-292">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-293">一到两个可选字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-293">one to two optional letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-294">四到九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-294">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-295">或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-295">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-296">九位数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-296">nine digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-297">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-297">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-298">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-298">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-299">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-299">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-300">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-300">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-301">正则表达式 Regex_australia_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-301">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-302">找到 Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-302">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-303">未找到 Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-303">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_australia_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-305">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-305">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-306">international driving permits</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-306">international driving permits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-307">australian automobile association</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-307">australian automobile association</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-308">international driving permit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-308">international driving permit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-309">DriverLicence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-309">DriverLicence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-310">DriverLicences</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-310">DriverLicences</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-311">Driver Lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-311">Driver Lic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-312">Driver Licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-312">Driver Licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-313">Driver Licences</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-313">Driver Licences</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-314">DriversLic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-314">DriversLic</span></span>

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-403">澳大利亚医疗帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-403">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-404">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-404">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-405">10-11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-405">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-406">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-406">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-407">10-11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-407">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-408">第一个数字范围为 2-6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-408">First digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-409">九个数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-409">Nine digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-410">第十个数字是问题数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-410">Tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-411">第十一个数字（可选）是个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-411">Eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-412">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-412">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-413">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-413">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-414">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-414">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-415">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-415">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-416">函数 Func_australian_medical_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-416">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-417">找到 Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-417">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-418">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-418">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-419">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-419">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_australia_medical_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-420">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-420">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-421">bank account details</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-421">bank account details</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-422">medicare payments</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-422">medicare payments</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-423">mortgage account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-423">mortgage account</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-424">bank payments</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-424">bank payments</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-425">information branch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-425">information branch</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-426">credit card loan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-426">credit card loan</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-427">department of human services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-427">department of human services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-428">local service</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-428">local service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-429">一</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-429">medicare</span></span>

   
## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-430">澳大利亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-430">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-431">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-431">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-432">一个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-432">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-433">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-433">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-434">字母 (区分大小写) 后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-434">A letter (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-435">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-435">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-436">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-436">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-437">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-437">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-438">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-438">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-439">正则表达式 Regex_australia_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-439">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-440">找到来自Keyword_passport或Keyword_australia_passport_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-440">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->
<Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
        </Any>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>   
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-474">澳大利亚税务文件编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-474">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-475">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-475">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-476">八到九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-476">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-477">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-477">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-478">8 到 9 个数字通常显示空格，如下所示：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-478">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-479">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-479">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-480">可选空间</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-480">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-481">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-481">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-482">可选空间</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-482">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-483">两到三个数字，其中最后一个数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-483">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-484">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-484">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-485">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-485">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-486">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-486">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-487">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-487">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-488">函数 Func_australian_tax_file_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-488">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-489">未找到 Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number 或 Keyword_number_exclusions 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-489">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-490">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-490">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-502">奥地利驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-502">Austria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-503">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-503">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-504">不带空格和分隔符的八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-504">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-505">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-505">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-506">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-506">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-507">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-507">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-508">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-508">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-509">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-509">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-510">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-510">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-511">正则表达式查找  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-511">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-512">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-512">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="682f18ce-44eb-482b-8198-2bcb96a0761e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-639">奥地利身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-639">Austria identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-640">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-640">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-641">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-641">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-642">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-642">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-643">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-643">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-644">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-644">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-645">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-645">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-646">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-646">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-647">字母、数字和特殊字符的 24 个字符组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-647">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-648">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-648">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-649">24 个字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-649">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-650">22 个字母 (不区分大小写) 数字、反斜杠、正斜杠或加号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-650">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-651">两个字母 (区分大小写) 、数字、反斜杠、正斜杠、加号或等号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-651">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-652">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-652">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-653">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-653">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-654">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-654">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-655">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-655">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-656">正则表达式查找  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-656">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-657">找到一个  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-657">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-658">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-658">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-659">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-659">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-660">标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-660">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-661">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-661">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-662">personalausichsich österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-662">personalausweis republik österreich</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-663">奥地利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-663">Austria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-664">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-664">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-665">一个字母后跟一个可选空格和七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-665">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-666">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-666">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-667">一个字母、七个数字和一个空格的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-667">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-668">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-668">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-669">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-669">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-670">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-670">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-671">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-671">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-672">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-672">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-673">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-673">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-674">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-674">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-675">正则表达式查找  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-675">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-676">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-676">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-677">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` DD.MM.YYYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-677">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-678">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-678">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-679">正则表达式查找  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-679">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-680">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-680">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1c96ae4e-303b-447d-86c7-77113ac266bf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-social-security-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-704">奥地利社会保险号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-704">Austria social security number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-705">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-705">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-706">指定格式的 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-706">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-707">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-707">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-708">10 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-708">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-709">对应于序列号的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-709">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-710">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-710">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-711">对应于 DDMMYY (出生日期的六) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-711">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-712">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-712">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-713">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-713">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-714">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-714">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-715">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-715">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-716">该  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-716">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-717">找到关键字  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-717">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-718">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-718">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-719">该  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-719">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Social Security Number -->
      <Entity id="6896a906-86c9-4d19-a2da-6e43ccd19b7b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-745">奥地利税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-745">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-746">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-746">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-747">带可选连字符和正斜杠的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-747">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-748">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-748">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-749">带可选连字符和正斜杠的九个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-749">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-750">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-750">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-751">可选连字符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-751">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-752">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-752">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-753">可选 (斜杠) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-753">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-754">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-754">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-755">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-755">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-756">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-756">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-757">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-757">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-758">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-758">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-759">该  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-759">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-760">找到一个  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-760">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-761">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其可信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-761">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-762">该  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-762">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-785">奥地利增值税</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-785">Austria value added tax</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-786">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-786">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-787">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-787">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-788">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-788">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-789">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-789">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-790">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-790">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-791">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-791">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-792">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-792">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-793">11 字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-793">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-794">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-794">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-795">11 字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-795">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-796">A 或 a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-796">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-797">T 或 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-797">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-798">可选空间</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-798">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-799">U 或 u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-799">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-800">可选空间</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-800">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-801">两个或三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-801">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-802">可选空间</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-802">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-803">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-803">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-804">可选空间</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-804">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-805">一个或两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-805">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-806">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-806">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-807">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-807">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-808">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-808">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-809">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-809">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-810">函数Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-810">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-811">找到来自Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-811">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-812">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-812">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-813">函数Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-813">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-827">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-827">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span></span>

## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-831">Azure DocumentDB 身份验证密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-831">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-832">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-832">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-833">字符串"DocumentDb"后跟下面的模式中列出的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-833">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-834">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-834">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-835">字符串"DocumentDb"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-835">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-836">3-200 位小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-836">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-837">大于符号 (>) 、等号 (=) 、引号 (") 或撇号 (表示) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-837">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-838">86 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 + (的组合) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-838">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-839">两个等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-839">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-840">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-840">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-841">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-841">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-842">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-842">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-843">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-843">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-844">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-844">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-845">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-845">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-849">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-849">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-850">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-850">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-851">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-851">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-852">沙盒</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-852">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-853">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-853">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-854">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-854">localhost</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-856">testacs。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-856">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-857">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-857">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-858">s-int。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-858">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-859">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-859">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-860">Azure IAAS 数据库连接字符串和 Azure SQL连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-860">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-861">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-861">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-862">字符串"Server"、"server"或"data source"后跟模式中列出的字符和字符串，包括字符串"cloudapp.azure"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-862">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-863">com"或"cloudapp.azure"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-863">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-864">net"或"database.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-864">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-865">net"，以及字符串"Password"或"password"或"pwd"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-865">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-866">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-866">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-867">字符串"Server"、"server"或"data source"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-867">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-868">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-868">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-869">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-869">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-870">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-870">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-871">1-200 小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-871">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-872">字符串"cloudapp.azure"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-872">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-873">com"、"cloudapp.azure"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-873">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-874">net"或"database.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-874">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-875">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-875">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-876">1-300 小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-876">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-877">字符串"Password"、"password"或"pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-877">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-878">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-878">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-879">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-879">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-880">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-880">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-881">一个或多个字符不是分号 (;) 、引号 (") 或撇 () </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-881">one or more characters that aren't a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-882">分号 (;) 、引号 () 或撇号 () </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-882">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-883">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-883">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-884">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-884">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-885">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-885">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-886">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-886">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-887">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-887">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-888">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-888">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-889">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-889">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-890">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-890">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-891"> (，此敏感信息类型使用正则表达式（而不是关键字列表）标识这些关键字。) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-891">(Technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-892">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-892">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-893">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-893">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-894">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-894">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-895">沙盒</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-895">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-896">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-896">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-897">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-897">localhost</span></span>
