## <a name="azure-iot-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-903">Azure IoT 连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-903">Azure IoT connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-904">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-904">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-905">字符串"HostName"后跟模式中列出的字符和字符串，包括字符串"azure-devices"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-905">The string "HostName" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-906">net"和"SharedAccessKey"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-906">net" and "SharedAccessKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-907">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-907">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-908">字符串"HostName"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-908">the string "HostName"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-909">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-909">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-910">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-910">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-911">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-911">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-912">1-200 小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-912">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-913">字符串"azure-devices"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-913">the string "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-914">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-914">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-915">1-200 小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-915">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-916">字符串"SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-916">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-917">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-917">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-918">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-918">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-919">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-919">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-920">43 个小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 + (的组合) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-920">any combination of 43 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-921">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-921">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-922">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-922">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-923">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-923">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-924">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-924">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-925">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-925">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-926">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-926">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-927">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-927">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IoT Connection String-->
<Entity id="0b34bec3-d5d6-4974-b7b0-dcdb5c90c29d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-935">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-935">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-936">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-936">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-937">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-937">127.0.0.1</span></span>

## <a name="azure-publish-setting-password"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-942">Azure 发布设置密码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-942">Azure publish setting password</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-943">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-943">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-944">字符串"userpwd="后跟字母数字字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-944">The string "userpwd=" followed by an alphanumeric string.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-945">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-945">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-946">字符串"userpwd="</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-946">the string "userpwd="</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-947">60 个小写字母或数字的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-947">any combination of 60 lowercase letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-948">引号 (") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-948">a quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-949">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-949">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-950">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-950">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-951">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-951">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-952">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-952">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-953">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-953">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-954">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-954">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
<!--Azure Publish Setting Password-->
<Entity id="75f4cc8a-a68e-49e5-89ce-fa8f03d286a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords" />
       <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
           <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
       </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-redis-cache-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-969">Azure Redis 缓存连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-969">Azure Redis cache connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-970">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-970">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-971">字符串"redis.cache.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-971">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-972">net"后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串，包括字符串"password"或"pwd"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-972">net" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-973">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-973">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-974">字符串"redis.cache.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-974">the string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-975">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-975">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-976">1-200 小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-976">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-977">字符串"password"或"pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-977">the string "password" or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-978">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-978">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-979">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-979">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-980">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-980">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-981">43 个字符（小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) ）或加号 + (的任意组合) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-981">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-982">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-982">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-983">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-983">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-984">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-984">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-985">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-985">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-986">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-986">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-987">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-987">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-988">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-988">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Redis Cache Connection String-->
<Entity id="095a7e6c-efd8-46d5-af7b-5298d53a49fc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1003">Azure SAS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1003">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1004">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1004">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1005">字符串"sig"后跟下面的模式中列出的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1005">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1006">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1006">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1007">字符串"sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1007">the string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1008">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1008">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1009">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1009">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1010">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1010">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1011">43-53 个字符之间的任意组合，小写或大写字母、数字或百分号 (%) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1011">any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1012">字符串"%3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1012">the string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1013">不是小写或大写字母、数字或百分号的任何字符 (%) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1013">any character that isn't a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1014">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1014">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1015">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1015">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1016">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1016">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1017">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1017">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1018">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureSAS查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1018">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure SAS-->
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-service-bus-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1019">Azure 服务总线连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1019">Azure service bus connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1020">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1020">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1021">字符串"EndPoint"后跟模式中列出的字符和字符串，包括字符串"servicebus.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1021">The string "EndPoint" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1022">net"和"SharedAccesKey"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1022">net" and "SharedAccesKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1023">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1023">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1024">字符串"EndPoint"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1024">the string "EndPoint"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1025">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1025">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1026">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1026">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1027">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1027">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1028">1-200 小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1028">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1029">字符串"servicebus.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1029">the string "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1030">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1030">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1031">1-200 小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1031">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1032">字符串"SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1032">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1033">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1033">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1034">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1034">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1035">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1035">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1036">43 个字符（小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) ）或加号 + (的任意组合) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1036">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1037">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1037">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1038">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1038">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1039">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1039">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1040">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1040">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1041">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1041">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1042">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1042">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1043">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1043">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Service Bus Connection String-->
<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1058">Azure 存储帐户密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1058">Azure storage account key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1059">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1059">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1060">字符串"DefaultEndpointsProtocol"后跟模式中列出的字符和字符串，包括字符串"AccountKey"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1060">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "AccountKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1061">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1061">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1062">字符串"DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1062">the string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1063">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1063">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1064">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1064">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1065">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1065">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1066">1-200 小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1066">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1067">字符串"AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1067">the string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1068">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1068">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1069">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1069">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1070">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1070">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1071">86 个字符（小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 + (的任意组合) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1071">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1072">两个等 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1072">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1073">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1073">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1074">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1074">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1075">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1075">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1076">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1076">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1077">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1077">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1078">正则表达式CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1078">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1079">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1079">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1085"> (，此敏感信息类型使用正则表达式（而不是关键字列表）标识这些关键字。) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1085">(Technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1086">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1086">contoso</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1097">Azure 存储帐户密钥 (通用) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1097">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1098">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1098">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1099">86 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) 的任意组合，前面或后跟以下模式中列出的字符。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1099">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1100">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1100">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1101">零到大于符号 (>) 、撇号 (') 、等号 (=) 、引号 (") 或数字符号 (#) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1101">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1102">86 个字符（小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 + (的任意组合) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1102">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1103">两个等 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1103">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1104">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1104">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1105">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1105">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1106">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1106">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1107">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1107">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1108">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1108">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1109">比利时驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1109">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1110">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1110">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1111">不带空格和分隔符的 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1111">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1112">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1112">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1113">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1113">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1114">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1114">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1115">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1115">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1116">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1116">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1117">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1117">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1118">正则表达式查找  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1118">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1119">找到或 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1119">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Belgium Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d89fd329-9324-433c-b687-2c37bd5166f3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1252">比利时国家/区号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1252">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1253">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1253">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1254">11 个数字加上可选的分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1254">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1255">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1255">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1256">11 个数字加分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1256">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1257">YY 格式的六位数字和两个可选句点。MM.DD出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1257">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1258">点、短划线、空格中的可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1258">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1259">三个连续的数字 (为奇数，即使对于男性) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1259">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1260">点、短划线、空格中的可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1260">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1261">两个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1261">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1262">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1262">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1263">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1263">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1264">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1264">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1265">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1265">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1266">函数 Func_belgium_national_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1266">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1267">找到 Keyword_belgium_national_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1267">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1268">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1268">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1269">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其可信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1269">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1270">函数 Func_belgium_national_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1270">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1271">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1271">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
       <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1330">比利时护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1330">Belgium passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1331">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1331">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1332">两个字母后跟六个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1332">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1333">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1333">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1334">两个字母，后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1334">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1335">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1335">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1336">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1336">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1337">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1337">Definition</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1338">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1338">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1339">正则表达式查找  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1339">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1340">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1340">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1341">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date2` 格式为 DD MM YY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的 `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1341">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1342">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1342">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1343">正则表达式查找  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1343">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1344">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1344">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d7b1315b-21ca-4774-a32a-596010ff78fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1371">比利时增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1371">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1372">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1372">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1373">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1373">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1374">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1374">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1375">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1375">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1376">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1376">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1377">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1377">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1378">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1378">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1379">12 字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1379">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1380">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1380">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1381">12 字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1381">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1382">字母 B 或 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1382">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1383">字母 E 或 e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1383">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1384">数字 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1384">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1385">从 1 到 9 的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1385">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1386">可选点或连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1386">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1387">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1387">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1388">可选点或连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1388">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1389">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1389">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1390">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1390">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1391">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1391">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1392">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1392">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1393">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1393">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1394">函数Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1394">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1395">找到来自Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1395">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1396">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1396">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1397">函数Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1397">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1398">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1398">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1399">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1399">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1400">n？ tva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1400">nº tva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1401">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1401">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1402">vat no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1402">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1403">numéro t.v.a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1403">numéro t.v.a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1404">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1404">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1405">umsatzsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1405">umsatzsteuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1406">btw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1406">btw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1407">btw#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1407">btw#</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1409">巴西 CPF 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1409">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1410">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1410">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1411">11 个数字（包括校验位），可以格式化，也可以非格式化</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1411">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1412">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1412">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1413">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1413">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1414">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1414">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1415">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1415">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1416">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1416">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1417">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1417">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1418">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1418">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1419">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1419">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1420">两个数字是检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1420">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1421">无格式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1421">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1422">11 个数字，其中最后两个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1422">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1423">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1423">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1424">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1424">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1425">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1425">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1426">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1426">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1427">函数 Func_brazil_cpf 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1427">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1428">找到 Keyword_brazil_cpf 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1428">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1429">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1429">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1430">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1430">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1431">函数 Func_brazil_cpf 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1431">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1432">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1432">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1433">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1433">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_cpf"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1434">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1434">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1438">收入</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1438">Revenue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1439">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1439">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1440">一个</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1440">Imposto</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1444">CNPJ (巴西法律) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1444">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1445">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1445">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1446">14 个数字（包括注册号、分行号码和校验位），再加上分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1446">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1447">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1447">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1448">14 个数字，再加上分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1448">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1449">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1449">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1450">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1450">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1451">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1451">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1452">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1452">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1453">前八 (三个数字是注册号码) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1453">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1454">正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1454">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1455">四位数的分支号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1455">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1456">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1456">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1457">两个数字是检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1457">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1458">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1458">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1459">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1459">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1460">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1460">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1461">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1461">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1462">函数 Func_brazil_cnpj 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1462">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1463">找到 Keyword_brazil_cnpj 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1463">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1464">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1464">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1465">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1465">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1466">函数 Func_brazil_cnpj 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1466">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1467">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1467">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1489">巴西国家身份证 (RG) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1489">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1490">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1490">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1491">Registro Geral (旧格式) ：九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1491">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1492">注册表 de Identidade (RIC)  (新格式) ：11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1492">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1493">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1493">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1494">Registro Geral（旧格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1494">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1495">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1495">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1496">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1496">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1497">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1497">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1498">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1498">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1499">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1499">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1500">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1500">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1501">一个数字，即一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1501">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1502">注册表 de Identidade (RIC)  (新格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1502">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1503">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1503">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1504">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1504">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1505">一个数字，即一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1505">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1506">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1506">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1507">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1507">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1508">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1508">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1509">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1509">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1510">函数 Func_brazil_rg 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1510">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1511">找到 Keyword_brazil_rg 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1511">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1512">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1512">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
      <Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1513">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1513">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1514">Keyword_brazil_rg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1514">Keyword_brazil_rg</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1515">Cédula de identidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1515">Cédula de identidade</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1516">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1516">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1517">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1517">national id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1518">número de rregistro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1518">número de rregistro</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1519">registro de Iidentidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1519">registro de Iidentidade</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1520">registro geral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1520">registro geral</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1521">RG (关键字区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1521">RG (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1522">RIC (关键字区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1522">RIC (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span> 


## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1523">保加利亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1523">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1524">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1524">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1525">不带空格和分隔符的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1525">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1526">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1526">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1527">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1527">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1528">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1528">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1529">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1529">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1530">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1530">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1531">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1531">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1532">正则表达式查找  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1532">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1533">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1533">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="66d39258-94c2-43b2-804b-aa312258e54b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>    
```

## <a name="bulgaria-uniform-civil-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1660">保加利亚统一编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1660">Bulgaria uniform civil number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1661">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1661">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1662">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1662">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1663">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1663">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1664">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1664">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1665">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1665">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1666">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1666">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1667">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1667">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1668">不带空格和分隔符的 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1668">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1669">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1669">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1670">不带空格和分隔符的 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1670">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1671">对应于 YYMMDD (出生日期的六) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1671">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1672">与出生日期顺序对应的两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1672">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1673">对应于性别的一个数字：一个偶数（针对男性）和一个奇数（对于男性）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1673">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1674">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1674">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1675">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1675">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1676">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1676">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1677">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1677">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1678">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1678">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1679">该  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1679">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1680">找到一个  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1680">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1681">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1681">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1682">该  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1682">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1727">保加利亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1727">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1728">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1728">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1729">不带空格和分隔符的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1729">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1730">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1730">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1731">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1731">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1732">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1732">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1733">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1733">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1734">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1734">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1735">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1735">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1736">正则表达式查找  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1736">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1737">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1737">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1738">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` DD.MM.YYYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1738">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1739">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1739">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1740">正则表达式查找  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1740">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1741">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1741">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="f7172b82-c588-4216-845e-4e54e397f29a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1761">加拿大银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1761">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1762">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1762">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1763">7 或 12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1763">7 or 12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1764">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1764">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1765">加拿大银行帐号是 7 位或 12 位。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1765">A Canada Bank Account Number is 7 or 12 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1766">加拿大银行帐户的银行代号是：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1766">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1767">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1767">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1768">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1768">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1769">三个数字或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1769">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1770">零"0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1770">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1771">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1771">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1772">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1772">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1773">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1773">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1774">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1774">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1775">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1775">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1776">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1776">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1777">找到 Keyword_canada_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1777">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1778">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1778">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1779">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1779">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1780">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1780">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1781">找到 Keyword_canada_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1781">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1782">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1782">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_canada_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1783">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1783">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1784">canada savings bonds</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1784">canada savings bonds</span></span>
