## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1805">加拿大驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1805">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1806">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1806">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1807">因省而异</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1807">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1808">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1808">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1809">各种模式，涵盖艾伯塔、 不列颠哥伦比亚、 马尼托巴、 新不伦瑞克、 纽芬兰/拉布拉多、 新斯科舍、 安大略、 爱德华王子岛，魁北克和萨斯喀彻温</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1809">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1810">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1810">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1811">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1811">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1812">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1812">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1813">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1813">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1814">函数 Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1814">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1815">找到 Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1815">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1816">找到 Keyword_canada_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1816">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_quebec_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_quebec_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_saskatchewan_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_saskatchewan_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1952">加拿大卫生服务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1952">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1953">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1953">Format</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1954">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1954">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1955">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1955">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1956">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1956">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1957">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1957">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1958">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1958">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1959">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1959">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1960">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1960">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1961">正则表达式 Regex_canada_health_service_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1961">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1962">找到 Keyword_canada_health_service_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1962">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1963">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1963">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_canada_health_service_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1964">Keyword_canada_health_service_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1964">Keyword_canada_health_service_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1965">personal health number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1965">personal health number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1966">patient information</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1966">patient information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1967">health services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1967">health services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1968">speciality services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1968">speciality services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1969">automobile accident</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1969">automobile accident</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1970">patient hospital</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1970">patient hospital</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1971">psychiatrist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1971">psychiatrist</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1972">workers compensation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1972">workers compensation</span></span>

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1974">加拿大护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1974">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1975">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1975">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1976">两个小写字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1976">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1977">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1977">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1978">两个小写字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1978">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1979">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1979">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1980">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1980">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1981">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1981">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1982">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1982">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1983">正则表达式 Regex_canada_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1983">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-1984">找到来自Keyword_canada_passport_number或Keyword_passport关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-1984">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2014">加拿大个人健康标识号 (PHIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2014">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2015">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2015">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2016">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2016">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2017">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2017">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2018">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2018">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2019">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2019">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2020">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2020">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2021">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2021">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2022">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2022">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2023">正则表达式 Regex_canada_phin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2023">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2024">至少找到两个关键字Keyword_canada_phin或Keyword_canada_provinces关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2024">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2057">加拿大社会保险号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2057">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2058">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2058">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2059">九个数字（可选连字符或空格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2059">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2060">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2060">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2061">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2061">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2062">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2062">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2063">连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2063">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2064">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2064">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2065">连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2065">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2066">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2066">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2067">无格式：九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2067">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2068">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2068">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2069">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2069">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2070">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2070">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2071">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2071">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2072">函数 Func_canadian_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2072">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2073">至少两个以下任意组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2073">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2074">找到 Keyword_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2074">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2075">找到 Keyword_sin_collaborative 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2075">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2076">函数 Func_eu_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2076">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2077">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2077">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2078">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2078">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2079">函数 Func_unformatted_canadian_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2079">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2080">找到 Keyword_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2080">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2081">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2081">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2091">numero d'assurance social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2091">numero d'assurance social</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2092">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2092">national identification number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2098">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2098">driver's license</span></span>

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2106">智利身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2106">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2107">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2107">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2108">七到八个数字加上分隔符一个检查数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2108">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2109">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2109">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2110">七到八个数字加分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2110">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2111">一到两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2111">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2112">可选时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2112">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2113">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2113">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2114">可选时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2114">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2115">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2115">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2116">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2116">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2117">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) 是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2117">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2118">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2118">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2119">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2119">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2120">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2120">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2121">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2121">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2122">函数 Func_chile_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2122">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2123">找到 Keyword_chile_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2123">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2124">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2124">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2125">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2125">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2126">函数 Func_chile_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2126">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2127">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2127">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2128">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2128">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_chile_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2129">Keyword_chile_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2129">Keyword_chile_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2130">cédula de identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2130">cédula de identidad</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2131">identificación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2131">identificación</span></span>

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2164">中国居民身份证 (中国) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2164">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2165">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2165">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2166">18 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2166">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2167">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2167">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2168">18 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2168">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2169">地址代码为六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2169">six digits that are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2170">八个数字，格式为 YYYYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2170">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2171">三个数字，即订单代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2171">three digits that are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2172">一个数字，即一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2172">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2173">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2173">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2174">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2174">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2175">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2175">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2176">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2176">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2177">函数 Func_china_resident_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2177">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2178">找到 Keyword_china_resident_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2178">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2179">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2179">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2180">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2180">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2181">函数 Func_china_resident_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2181">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2182">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2182">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2183">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2183">Keywords</span></span>

### <a name="keyword_china_resident_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2184">Keyword_china_resident_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2184">Keyword_china_resident_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2185">Resident Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2185">Resident Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2186">中国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2186">PRC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2187">National Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2187">National Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2188">身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2188">身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2189">居民 身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2189">居民 身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2190">居民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2190">居民身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2191">鉴定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2191">鉴定</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2192">身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2192">身分證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2193">居民身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2193">居民 身份證</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2194">鑑定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2194">鑑定</span></span> 

   
## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2195">信用卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2195">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2196">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2196">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2197">14 到 16 个数字，可以设置格式 (dddddddd) 且必须通过 Luhn 测试。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2197">14 to 16 digits that can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and that must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2198">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2198">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2199">复杂可靠的模式，可检测来自全球所有主要品牌的卡，包括 Visa、MasterCard、Discover Card、JCB、American Express、名片和餐厅卡。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2199">Complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2200">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2200">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2201">是，Luhn 校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2201">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2202">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2202">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2203">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2203">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2204">函数 Func_credit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2204">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2205">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2205">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2206">找到 Keyword_cc_verification 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2206">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2207">找到 Keyword_cc_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2207">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2208">函数 Func_expiration_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2208">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2209">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2209">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2210">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其可信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2210">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2211">函数 Func_credit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2211">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2212">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2212">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2472">克罗地亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2472">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2473">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2473">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2474">不带空格和分隔符的八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2474">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2475">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2475">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2476">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2476">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2477">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2477">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2478">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2478">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2479">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2479">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2480">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2480">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2481">正则表达式查找  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2481">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2482">找到或 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2482">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="005b3ef1-47dd-4e68-bb02-c6db484d00f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2606">克罗地亚身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2606">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2607">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家标识号敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2607">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2608">它作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2608">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2609">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2609">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2610">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2610">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2611">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2611">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2612">九个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2612">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2613">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2613">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2614">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2614">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2615">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2615">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2616">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2616">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2617">函数 Func_croatia_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2617">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2618">找到 Keyword_croatia_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2618">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2649">克罗地亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2649">Croatia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2650">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2650">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2651">不带空格和分隔符的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2651">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2652">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2652">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2653">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2653">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2654">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2654">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2655">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2655">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2656">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2656">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2657">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2657">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2658">正则表达式查找  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2658">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2659">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2659">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2660">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` DD.MM.YYYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2660">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2661">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2661">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2662">正则表达式查找  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2662">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2663">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2663">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Croatia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7d7a729d-32d8-4204-8d01-d5e6a6c25581" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2669">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2669">passports</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2674">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2674">passportnumbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2676">Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2676">Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2677">broj putov一</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2677">broj putovnice</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2678">br。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2678">br.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2679">Putov一</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2679">Putovnice</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2680">br putov一</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2680">br putovnice</span></span>
   
## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2681">克罗地亚个人标识 (OIB) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2681">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2682">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2682">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2683">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2683">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2684">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2684">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2685">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2685">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2686">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2686">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2687">最终数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2687">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2688">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2688">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2689">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2689">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2690">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2690">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2691">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2691">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2692">函数 Func_croatia_oib_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2692">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2693">找到来自Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2693">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2694">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2694">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2695">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2695">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2696">函数 Func_croatia_oib_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2696">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2697">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2697">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2728">克罗地亚社会保险号或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2728">Croatia social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2729">此敏感信息类型实体仅在欧盟社会保险号或等效 ID 敏感信息类型中可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2729">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2730">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2730">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2731">不带空格和分隔符的 11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2731">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2732">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2732">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2733">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2733">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2734">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2734">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2735">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2735">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2736">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2736">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2737">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2737">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2738">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2738">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2739">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2739">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2740">该  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2740">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2741">找到一个  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2741">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2742">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2742">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2743">该  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2743">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2760">塞浦路斯驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2760">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2761">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2761">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2762">不带空格和分隔符的 12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2762">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2763">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2763">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2764">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2764">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2765">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2765">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2766">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2766">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2767">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2767">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2768">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2768">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2769">正则表达式查找  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2769">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2770">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2770">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="356fa104-f9ac-4aff-a0e4-2e6e65ea06c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2895">塞浦路斯身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2895">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2896">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2896">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2897">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2897">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2898">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2898">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2899">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2899">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2900">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2900">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2901">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2901">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2902">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2902">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2903">不带空格和分隔符的 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2903">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2904">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2904">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2905">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2905">10 digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2906">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2906">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2907">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2907">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2908">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2908">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2909">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2909">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2910">正则表达式查找  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2910">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2911">找到一个  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2911">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2912">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2912">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2913">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2913">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2914">id 卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2914">id card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2915">标识卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2915">identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2916">kim karti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2916">kimlik karti</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2917">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2917">national identification number</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2920">塞浦路斯护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2920">Cyprus passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2921">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2921">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2922">一个字母后跟 6-8 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2922">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2923">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2923">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2924">一个字母后跟六到八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2924">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2925">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2925">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2926">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2926">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2927">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2927">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2928">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2928">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2929">正则表达式查找  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2929">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2930">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2930">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2931">正则表达式查找 `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` DD/MM/YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2931">The regular expression `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD/MM/YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2932">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2932">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2933">正则表达式查找  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2933">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2934">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2934">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>  
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="9193e2e8-7f8c-43c1-a274-ac40d651936f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2963">塞浦路斯税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2963">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2964">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2964">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2965">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2965">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2966">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2966">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2967">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2967">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2968">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2968">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2969">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2969">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2970">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2970">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2971">指定模式中有八个数字和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2971">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2972">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2972">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2973">八个数字和一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2973">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2974">"0"或"9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2974">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2975">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2975">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2976">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2976">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2977">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2977">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2978">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2978">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2979">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2979">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2980">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2980">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2981">该  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2981">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2982">找到一个  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2982">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2983">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2983">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-2984">该  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-2984">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3012">捷克驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3012">Czech driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3013">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3013">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3014">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3014">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3015">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3015">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3016">八个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3016">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3017">字母"E" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3017">letter 'E' (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3018">一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3018">a letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3019">可选 (空格) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3019">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3020">六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3020">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3021">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3021">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3022">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3022">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3023">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3023">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3024">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3024">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3025">正则表达式查找  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3025">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3026">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3026">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <Entity id="86b40d3b-d8ea-4c36-aab0-ef9416a6769c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3152">捷克护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3152">Czech passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3153">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3153">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3154">不带空格或分隔符的八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3154">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3155">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3155">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3156">不带空格或分隔符的八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3156">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3157">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3157">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3158">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3158">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3159">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3159">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3160">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3160">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3161">正则表达式查找  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3161">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3162">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3162">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3163">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` DD.MM.YYYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3163">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3164">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3164">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3165">正则表达式查找  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3165">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3166">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3166">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Czech Republic Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7bcd8ce8-5e92-4bbe-bc92-fa669f0369fa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3188">捷克个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3188">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3189">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3189">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3190">具有可选正斜杠的九个数字 (格式) 10 个数字，带可选正斜杠 (新格式) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3190">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) 10 digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3191">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3191">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3192">九位数字 (旧格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3192">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3193">表示出生日期的六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3193">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3194">可选正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3194">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3195">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3195">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3196">10 个数字 (新格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3196">10 digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3197">表示出生日期的六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3197">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3198">可选正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3198">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3199">四个数字，其中最后一个数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3199">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3200">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3200">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3201">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3201">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3202">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3202">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3203">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3203">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3204">函数 Func_czech_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3204">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3205">找到 Keyword_czech_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3205">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3206">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3206">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3207">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3207">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3208">函数Func_czech_id_card_new_format查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3208">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3209">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3209">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```
