## <a name="czech-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3256">捷克社会保险号或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3256">Czech social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3257">此敏感信息类型实体仅在欧盟社会保险号或等效 ID 敏感信息类型中可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3257">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3258">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3258">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3259">指定模式中的 10 个数字和反杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3259">10 digits and a backslash in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3260">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3260">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3261">10 个数字和反杠：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3261">10 digits and a backslash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3262">对应于 YYMMDD (出生日期的六) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3262">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD):</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3263">反杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3263">a backslash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3264">三个数字，对应于一个序列号，该序列号分隔同一日期的人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3264">three digits that correspond to a serial number that separates persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3265">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3265">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3266">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3266">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3267">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3267">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3268">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3268">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3269">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3269">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3270">该  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3270">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3271">找到一个  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3271">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3272">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3272">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3273">该  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3273">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3281">ssn#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3281">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3282">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3282">ssn</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3285">personalidnumber#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3285">personalidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3286">rgam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3286">rč</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3287">rodné ííslo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3287">rodné číslo</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3288">rodne cislo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3288">rodne cislo</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3289">丹麦驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3289">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3290">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3290">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3291">不带空格和分隔符的八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3291">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3292">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3292">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3293">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3293">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3294">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3294">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3295">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3295">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3296">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3296">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3297">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3297">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3298">正则表达式查找  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3298">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3299">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3299">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="98a95812-6203-451a-a220-d39870ebef0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3423">丹麦护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3423">Denmark passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3424">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3424">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3425">不带空格和分隔符的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3425">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3426">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3426">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3427">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3427">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3428">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3428">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3429">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3429">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3430">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3430">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3431">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3431">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3432">正则表达式查找  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3432">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3433">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3433">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3434">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date2` DD MM YY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3434">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3435">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3435">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3436">正则表达式查找  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3436">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3437">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3437">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="25e8c47e-e6fe-4884-a211-74898f8c0196" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3457">丹麦个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3457">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3458">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3458">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3459">10 个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3459">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3460">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3460">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3461">10 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3461">10 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3462">格式为 DDMMYY 的六位数字，即出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3462">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3463">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3463">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3464">四个数字，其中最后一个数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3464">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3465">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3465">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3466">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3466">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3467">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3467">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3468">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3468">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3469">正则表达式Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3469">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3470">找到 Keyword_denmark_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3470">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3471">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3471">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3472">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其可信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3472">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3473">正则表达式Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3473">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3474">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3474">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3543">sygesikringskortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3543">sygesikringskortnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3544">sygesikringsnr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3544">sygesikringsnr</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3546">丹麦社会保险号或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3546">Denmark social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3547">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3547">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3548">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3548">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3549">指定模式中的 10 个数字和连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3549">10 digits and a hyphen in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3550">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3550">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3551">10 个数字和一个连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3551">10 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3552">对应于 DDMMYY (出生日期的六) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3552">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3553">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3553">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3554">对应于序列号的四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3554">four digits that correspond to a sequence number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3555">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3555">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3556">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3556">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3557">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3557">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3558">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3558">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3559">该  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3559">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3560">找到一个  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3560">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3561">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3561">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3562">该  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3562">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3564">Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3564">Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3576">管制局 (DEA) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3576">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3577">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3577">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3578">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3578">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3579">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3579">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3580">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3580">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3581">一个字母 (可能) 字母集不区分大小写：abcdefghjklmnprstux，这是一个注册表代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3581">one letter (not case-sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3582">一个字母 (不区分大小写) ，即注册人姓氏或数字"9"的第一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3582">one letter (not case-sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name or digit '9'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3583">七个数字，最后一个数字是检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3583">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3584">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3584">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3585">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3585">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3586">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3586">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3587">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3587">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3588">函数 Func_dea_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3588">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3589">找到来自 `Keyword_dea_number` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3589">A keyword from `Keyword_dea_number` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3590">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3590">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3591">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3591">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3592">函数 Func_dea_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3592">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3593">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3593">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- DEA Number -->
    <Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.1207.000" maxEngineVersion="15.20.3134.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3135.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
    </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_dea_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3595">Keyword_dea_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3595">Keyword_dea_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3598">犯罪强制执行管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3598">drug enforcement administration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3599">犯罪管制局</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3599">drug enforcement agency</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3600">爱沙尼亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3600">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3601">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3601">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3602">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3602">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3603">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3603">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3604">两个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3604">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3605">字母"ET" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3605">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3606">六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3606">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3607">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3607">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3608">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3608">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3609">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3609">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3610">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3610">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3611">正则表达式查找  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3611">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3612">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3612">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="51da8171-da70-4cc1-9d65-055a59ca4f83" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3642">driver'licenses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3642">driver'licenses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3643">driver'licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3643">driver'licence</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3738">爱沙尼亚个人标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3738">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3739">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3739">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3740">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3740">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3741">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3741">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3742">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3742">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3743">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3743">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3744">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3744">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3745">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3745">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3746">不带空格和分隔符的 11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3746">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3747">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3747">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3748">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3748">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3749">一个数字，对应于性生活和世纪 (奇数男性，偶数为男性;1-2：19 世纪;3-4：20 世纪;5-6：21 世纪) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3749">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3750">对应于 YYMMDD (出生日期的六) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3750">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3751">三个数字，对应于一个序列号，分隔同一日期的人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3751">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3752">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3752">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3753">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3753">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3754">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3754">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3755">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3755">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3756">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3756">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3757">该  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3757">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3758">找到一个  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3758">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3759">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3759">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3760">该  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3760">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3761">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3761">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3762">Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3762">Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3793">爱沙尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3793">Estonia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3794">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3794">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3795">一个字母后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3795">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3796">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3796">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3797">一个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3797">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3798">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3798">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3799">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3799">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3800">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3800">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3801">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3801">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3802">正则表达式查找  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3802">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3803">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3803">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3804">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` DD.MM.YYYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3804">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3805">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3805">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3806">正则表达式查找  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3806">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3807">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3807">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61f7073a-509e-425b-a754-bc01bb5d5b8c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3825">欧盟借记卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3825">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3826">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3826">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3827">16 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3827">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3828">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3828">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3829">复杂可靠的模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3829">Complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3830">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3830">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3831">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3831">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3832">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3832">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3833">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3833">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3834">函数 Func_eu_debit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3834">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3835">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3835">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3836">找到 Keyword_eu_debit_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3836">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3837">找到 Keyword_card_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3837">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3838">找到 Keyword_card_security_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3838">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3839">找到 Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3839">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3840">函数 Func_expiration_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3840">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-3841">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-3841">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4288">芬兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4288">Finland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4289">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4289">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4290">10 个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4290">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4291">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4291">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4292">包含连字符的 10 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4292">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4293">六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4293">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4294">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4294">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4295">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4295">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4296">数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4296">a digit or letter</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4297">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4297">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4298">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4298">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4299">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4299">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4300">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4300">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4301">正则表达式查找  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4301">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4302">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4302">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Finland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="bb3b27a3-79bd-4ac4-81a7-f9fca3c7d1a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4433">芬兰欧洲健康保险号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4433">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4434">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4434">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4435">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4435">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4436">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4436">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4437">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4437">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4438">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4438">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4439">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4439">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4440">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4440">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4441">20 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4441">20-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4442">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4442">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4443">20 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4443">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4444">10 个数字 - 8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4444">10 digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4445">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4445">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4446">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4446">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4447">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4447">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4448">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4448">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4449">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4449">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4450">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4450">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4451">正则表达式Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4451">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4452">找到来自Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4452">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4453">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4453">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4458">finska sjukförskringskort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4458">finska sjukförsäkringskort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4459">运行状况卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4459">health card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4464">sairausvakuutuskortti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4464">sairausvakuutuskortti</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4465">sairausvakuutusnumero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4465">sairausvakuutusnumero</span></span>

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4470">芬兰国家/区 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4470">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4471">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4471">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4472">六位数字加一个字符，指示一世纪加三个数字加上一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4472">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4473">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4473">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4474">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4474">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4475">格式为 DDMMYY 的六位数字，即出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4475">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4476">century marker (either '-'， '+' or 'a') </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4476">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4477">三位数的个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4477">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4478">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) 是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4478">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4479">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4479">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4480">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4480">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4481">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4481">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4482">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4482">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4483">函数Func_finnish_national_id查找与模式匹配的内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4483">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4484">找到Keyword_finnish_national_id关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4484">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4485">校验和传递</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4485">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4486">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4486">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4487">函数Func_finnish_national_id查找与模式匹配的内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4487">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4488">校验和传递</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4488">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4537">芬兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4537">Finland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4538">此敏感信息类型实体在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中可用，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4538">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4539">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4539">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4540">九个字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4540">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4541">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4541">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4542">九个字母和数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4542">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4543">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4543">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4544">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4544">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4545">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4545">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4546">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4546">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4547">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4547">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4548">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4548">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4549">正则表达式查找 `Regex_finland_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4549">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4550">找到或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keyword_finland_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4550">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4551">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` DD.MM.YYYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4551">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4552">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4552">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4553">正则表达式查找 `Regex_finland_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4553">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4554">找到或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keyword_finland_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4554">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4578">法国驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4578">France driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4579">此敏感信息类型实体在欧盟驾驶证号码敏感信息类型中可用，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4579">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4580">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4580">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4581">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4581">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4582">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4582">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4583">12 个数字，会对类似模式（如法国电话号码）进行验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4583">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4584">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4584">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4585">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4585">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4586">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4586">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4587">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4587">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4588">函数Func_french_drivers_license找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4588">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4589">找到来自Keyword_french_drivers_license的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4589">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4716">法国健康保险号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4716">France health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4717">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4717">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4718">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4718">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4719">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4719">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4720">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4720">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4721">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4721">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4722">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4722">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4723">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4723">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4724">21 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4724">21-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4725">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4725">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4726">21 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4726">21-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4727">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4727">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4728">可选空间</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4728">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4729">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4729">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4730">可选空间</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4730">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4731">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4731">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4732">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4732">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4733">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4733">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4734">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4734">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4735">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4735">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4736">正则表达式Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4736">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4737">找到来自Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4737">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4738">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4738">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4739">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4739">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4740">保险卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4740">insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4741">carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4741">carte vitale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4742">carte d'assuré social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4742">carte d'assuré social</span></span>


## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4743">法国国家/ (CNI) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4743">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4744">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4744">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4745">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4745">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4746">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4746">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4747">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4747">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4748">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4748">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4749">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4749">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4750">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4750">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4751">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其可信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4751">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4752">正则表达式 Regex_france_cni 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4752">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4753">找到来自Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4753">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4754">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4754">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4755">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4755">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4756">card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4756">card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4757">carte nationale d'identité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4757">carte nationale d’identité</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4758">carte nationale d'idenite no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4758">carte nationale d'idenite no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4759">cni#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4759">cni#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4760">cni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4760">cni</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4761">compte bancaire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4761">compte bancaire</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4762">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4762">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4763">national identity</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4763">national identity</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4764">nationalidno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4764">nationalidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4765">numéro d'assurance malmée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4765">numéro d'assurance maladie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4766">numéro de carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4766">numéro de carte vitale</span></span>

   
## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4767">法国护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4767">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4768">此敏感信息类型实体在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4768">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4769">它作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4769">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4770">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4770">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4771">九个数字和字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4771">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4772">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4772">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4773">九个数字和字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4773">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4774">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4774">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4775">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4775">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4776">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4776">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4777">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4777">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4778">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4778">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4779">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4779">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4780">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4780">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4781">该 `Func_fr_passport` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4781">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4782">找到或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4782">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4783">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` DD MM YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4783">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4784">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4784">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4785">该 `Func_fr_passport` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4785">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4786">找到或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4786">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- France Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4787">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4787">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4796">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4796">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4797">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4797">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4798">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4798">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4799">Keywords_france_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4799">Keywords_france_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4800">numéro de passeport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4800">numéro de passeport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4801">passeport n °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4801">passeport n °</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4802">passeport non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4802">passeport non</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4803">passeport#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4803">passeport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4804">passeport#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4804">passeport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4805">passeportnon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4805">passeportnon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4806">passeportn °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4806">passeportn °</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4807">passeport français</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4807">passeport français</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4808">passeport livre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4808">passeport livre</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4809">passeport carte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4809">passeport carte</span></span>

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4817">INSEE (或等效) 的法国社会保险号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4817">France social security number (INSEE) or equivalent identification</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4818">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4818">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4819">15 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4819">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4820">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4820">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4821">必须匹配两种模式之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4821">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4822">13 个数字后跟一个空格，后跟两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4822">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4823">或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4823">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4824">15 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4824">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4825">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4825">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4826">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4826">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4827">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4827">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4828">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4828">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4829">该 `Func_french_insee` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4829">The function `Func_french_insee` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4830">找到 Keyword_fr_insee 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4830">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4831">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4831">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4832">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4832">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4833">函数Func_french_insee或Func_fr_insee找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4833">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4834">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4834">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France INSEE -->
    <Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```
