## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4865">法国税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4865">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4866">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4866">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4867">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4867">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4868">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4868">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4869">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4869">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4870">一个数字，必须为 0、1、2 或 3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4870">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4871">一位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4871">One digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4872">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4872">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4873">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4873">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4874">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4874">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4875">三个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4875">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4876">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4876">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4877">三个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4877">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4878">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4878">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4879">三个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4879">Three check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4880">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4880">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4881">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4881">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4882">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4882">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4883">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4883">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4884">该  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4884">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4885">找到一个  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4885">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4886">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4886">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4887">该  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4887">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4894">tax no#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4894">tax no#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4899">所no#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4899">taxidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4900">6000#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4900">taxidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4901">taxno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4901">taxno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4902">taxnumber#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4902">taxnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4903">taxnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4903">taxnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4904">tin id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4904">tin id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4905">tin no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4905">tin no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4906">tin#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4906">tin#</span></span>


## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4907">法国增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4907">France value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4908">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4908">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4909">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4909">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4910">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4910">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4911">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4911">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4912">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4912">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4913">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4913">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4914">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4914">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4915">13 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4915">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4916">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4916">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4917">13 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4917">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4918">两个字母 - FR (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4918">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4919">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4919">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4920">两个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4920">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4921">可选空格、点、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4921">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4922">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4922">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4923">可选空格、点、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4923">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4924">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4924">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4925">可选空格、点、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4925">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4926">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4926">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4927">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4927">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4928">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4928">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4929">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4929">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4930">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4930">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4931">函数Func_france_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4931">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4932">找到来自Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4932">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4933">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4933">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4934">函数Func_france_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4934">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4935">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4935">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4946">numéro d'identification siren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4946">numéro d'identification siren</span></span>


## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4947">德国驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4947">Germany driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4948">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驾驶证号码敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4948">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4949">它作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4949">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4950">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4950">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4951">11 个数字和字母的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4951">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4952">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4952">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4953">11 个数字和字母 (不区分) 大小写：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4953">11 digits and letters (not case-sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4954">数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4954">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4955">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4955">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4956">六个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4956">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4957">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4957">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4958">数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4958">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4959">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4959">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4960">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4960">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4961">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4961">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4962">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4962">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4963">函数 Func_german_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4963">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4964">找到 Keyword_german_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4964">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-4965">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-4965">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5114">德国身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5114">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5115">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5115">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5116">自 2010 年 11 月 1 日：九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5116">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5117">从 1987 年 4 月 1 日到 2010 年 10 月 31 日：10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5117">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5118">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5118">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5119">自 2010 年 11 月 1 日起：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5119">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5120">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5120">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5121">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5121">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5122">从 1987 年 4 月 1 日到 2010 年 10 月 31 日：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5122">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5123">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5123">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5124">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5124">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5125">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5125">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5126">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5126">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5127">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其可信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5127">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5128">正则表达式 Regex_germany_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5128">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5129">找到 Keyword_germany_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5129">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5130">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5130">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5134">identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5134">identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5135">identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5135">identifikation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5136">identifizierungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5136">identifizierungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5137">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5137">identity card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5141">personalausweis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5141">personalausweis</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5143">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5143">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5144">persönliche-id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5144">persönliche-id-nummer</span></span>


## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5145">德国护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5145">Germany passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5146">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5146">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5147">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5147">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5148">10 个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5148">10 digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5149">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5149">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5150">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5150">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5151">第一个字符是此集合中的数字或字母 (C、F、G、H、J、K) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5151">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5152">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5152">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5153">此集合中的五个数字或字母 (C、-H、J-N、P、R、T、V-Z) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5153">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5154">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5154">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5155">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5155">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5156">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5156">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5157">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5157">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5158">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5158">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5159">函数 Func_german_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5159">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5160">找到或 `Keyword_german_passport` 找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5160">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5161">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5161">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5162">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5162">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5163">函数 Func_german_passport_data 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5163">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5164">找到或 `Keyword_german_passport` 找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5164">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5165">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5165">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number_common"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5177">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5177">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5178">passport#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5178">passport#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5182">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5182">passportno</span></span>

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5188">德国税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5188">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5189">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5189">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5190">不带空格和分隔符的 11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5190">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5191">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5191">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5192">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5192">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5193">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5193">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5194">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5194">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5195">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5195">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5196">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5196">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5197">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5197">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5198">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5198">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5199">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5199">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5200">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5200">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5201">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5201">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5202">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5202">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5203">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5203">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5204">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5204">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5205">该  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5205">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5206">找到一个  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5206">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5207">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5207">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5208">该  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5208">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5217">税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5217">tax identification number</span></span>

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5234">德国增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5234">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5235">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5235">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5236">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5236">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5237">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5237">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5238">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5238">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5239">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5239">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5240">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5240">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5241">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5241">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5242">11 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5242">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5243">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5243">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5244">11 字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5244">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5245">字母 D 或 d</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5245">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5246">字母 E 或 e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5246">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5247">可选空间</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5247">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5248">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5248">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5249">可选空格或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5249">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5250">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5250">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5251">可选空格或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5251">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5252">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5252">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5253">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5253">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5254">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5254">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5255">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5255">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5256">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5256">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5257">函数Func_germany_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5257">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5258">找到来自Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5258">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5259">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5259">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5260">函数Func_germany_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5260">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5261">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5261">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5262">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5262">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5263">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5263">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5264">vat no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5264">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5265">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5265">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5266">vat# mehrwertsteuer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5266">vat#  mehrwertsteuer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5267">wdst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5267">mwst</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5268">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5268">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5269">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5269">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span></span>


## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5270">希腊驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5270">Greece driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5271">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驾驶证号码敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5271">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5272">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5272">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5273">不带空格和分隔符的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5273">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5274">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5274">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5275">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5275">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5276">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5276">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5277">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5277">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5278">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5278">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5279">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5279">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5280">正则表达式查找  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5280">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5281">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5281">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="7a2200b5-aacf-4e3c-ab36-136d3e68b7da" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5282">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5282">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5283">Keywords_eu_driver s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5283">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5284">driverlic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5284">driverlic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5285">driverlics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5285">driverlics</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5286">driverlicense</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5286">driverlicense</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5287">driverlicenses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5287">driverlicenses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5288">driverlicence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5288">driverlicence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5289">driverlicences</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5289">driverlicences</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5290">驱动程序 lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5290">driver lic</span></span>

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5407">希腊国家身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5407">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5408">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5408">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5409">7-8 个字母和数字组合加一个短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5409">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5410">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5410">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5411">七个字母和数字（旧格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5411">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5412">一个字母（希腊字母表中的任一字母） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5412">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5413">一个短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5413">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5414">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5414">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5415">八个字母和数字（新格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5415">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5416">大写字符同时出现在希腊和拉丁字母表中的两个字母 (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5416">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5417">一个短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5417">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5418">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5418">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5419">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5419">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5420">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5420">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5421">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5421">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5422">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5422">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5423">正则表达式 Regex_greece_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5423">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5424">找到 Keyword_greece_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5424">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5425">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其可信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5425">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5426">正则表达式 Regex_greece_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5426">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5427">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5427">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_greece_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5428">Keyword_greece_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5428">Keyword_greece_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5429">希腊语 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5429">greek id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5430">希腊语国家/身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5430">greek national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5431">希腊语个人 ID 卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5431">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5432">希腊语警察局 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5432">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5433">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5433">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5434">tautotita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5434">tautotita</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5435">ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5435">ταυτότητα</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5436">ταυτότητας</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5436">ταυτότητας</span></span>


## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5437">希腊护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5437">Greece passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5438">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5438">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5439">两个字母后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5439">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5440">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5440">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5441">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5441">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5442">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5442">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5443">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5443">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5444">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5444">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5445">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5445">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5446">正则表达式查找  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5446">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5447">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5447">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5448">正则表达式查找 `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` DD MMM YY 格式的日期 (示例 - 8 月 19) 或找到 `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5448">The regular expression `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM YY (Example - 28 Aug 19) or a keyword from `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5449">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5449">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5450">正则表达式查找  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5450">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5451">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5451">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7e65eb47-cdf9-4f52-8f90-2a27d5ee67e3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5453">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5453">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5456">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5456">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5457">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5457">passports</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5460">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5460">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5461">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5461">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5462">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5462">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5463">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5463">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5464">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5464">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5465">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5465">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5466">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5466">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5467">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5467">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span></span>


## <a name="greece-social-security-number-amka"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5468">希腊社会保险号码 (AMKA) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5468">Greece Social Security Number (AMKA)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5469">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5469">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5470">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5470">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5471">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5471">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5472">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5472">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5473">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5473">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5474">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5474">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5475">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5475">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5476">无空格和分隔符的十一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5476">Eleven digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5477">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5477">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5478">6 个数字作为出生日期 YYMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5478">6 digits as date of birth YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5479">4 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5479">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5480">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5480">a check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5481">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5481">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5482">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5482">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5483">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5483">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5484">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5484">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5485">该  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5485">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5486">找到一个  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5486">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5487">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5487">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5488">该  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5488">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Greece Social Security Number (AMKA) -->
      <Entity id="e39b03f4-50ea-41ae-af7a-a4b9539596ad" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5489">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5489">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5490">Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5490">Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5491">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5491">ssn</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5493">社会保险否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5493">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5494">socialsecurityno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5494">socialsecurityno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5495">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5495">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5496">amka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5496">amka</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5497">a.m.k.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5497">a.m.k.a.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5498">Αριθμού Μητρώου Κοινωνικής Ασφάλισης</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5498">Αριθμού Μητρώου Κοινωνικής Ασφάλισης</span></span>


## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5499">希腊税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5499">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5500">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5500">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5501">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5501">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5502">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5502">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5503">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5503">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5504">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5504">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5505">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5505">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5506">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5506">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5507">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5507">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5508">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5508">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5509">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5509">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5510">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5510">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5511">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5511">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5512">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5512">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5513">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5513">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5514">正则表达式查找  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5514">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5515">找到一个  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5515">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5544">香港身份证号码 (HKID) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5544">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5545">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5545">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5546">8-9 个字母和数字组合，最后一个字符两边可选择加括号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5546">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5547">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5547">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5548">8-9 个字母组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5548">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5549">1-2 个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5549">1-2 letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5550">六个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5550">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5551">最后一个字符（任意数字或字母 A）是校验位，两边可以选择加括号。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5551">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5552">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5552">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5553">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5553">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5554">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5554">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5555">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5555">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5556">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5556">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5557">找到 Keyword_hong_kong_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5557">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5558">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5558">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5559">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其可信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5559">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5560">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5560">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5561">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5561">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5601">匈牙利驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5601">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5602">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5602">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5603">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5603">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5604">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5604">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5605">两个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5605">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5606">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5606">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5607">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5607">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5608">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5608">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5609">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5609">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5610">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5610">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5611">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5611">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5612">正则表达式查找  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5612">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5613">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5613">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <Entity id="9d31c46b-6e6b-444c-aeb1-6dd7e604bb24" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5614">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5614">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5615">Keywords_eu_driver s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5615">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5616">driverlic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5616">driverlic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5617">driverlics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5617">driverlics</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5618">driverlicense</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5618">driverlicense</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5738">匈牙利个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5738">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5739">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5739">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5740">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5740">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5741">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5741">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5742">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5742">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5743">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5743">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5744">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5744">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5745">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5745">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5746">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5746">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5747">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5747">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5748">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5748">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5749">对于在 1900 之前 (男性、2 位男性和 2 性公民的性别数字，也可以提供其他数字) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5749">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5750">对应于 YYMMDD (出生日期的六) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5750">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5751">对应于序列号的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5751">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5752">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5752">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5753">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5753">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5754">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5754">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5755">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5755">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5756">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5756">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5757">该  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5757">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5758">找到一个  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5758">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5759">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5759">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5760">该  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5760">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5761">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5761">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5762">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5762">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5763">id 号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5763">id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5764">identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5764">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5765">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5765">sz ig</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5766">sz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5766">sz.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5767">ig。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5767">ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5768">sz.ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5768">sz.ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5769">személyazonosító igazolvcioy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5769">személyazonosító igazolvány</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5770">személyi igazolvméy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5770">személyi igazolvány</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5771">匈牙利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5771">Hungary passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5772">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5772">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5773">两个字母后跟六个或七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5773">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5774">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5774">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5775">两个字母后跟六个或七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5775">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5776">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5776">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5777">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5777">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5778">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5778">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5779">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5779">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5780">正则表达式查找  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5780">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5781">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5781">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5782">正则表达式查找 `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YY (示例 - 01 MÁR/MAR 12 格式的日期) 找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5782">The regular expression `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YY (Example - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5783">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5783">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5784">正则表达式查找  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5784">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5785">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5785">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5b483910-9aa7-4c99-9917-f4001464bda7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5799">útlevél száma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5799">útlevél száma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5800">Útlevelek száma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5800">Útlevelek száma</span></span>
