## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-taj"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5805">匈牙利社会保险号码 (塔吉) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5805">Hungary social security number (TAJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5806">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5806">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5807">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5807">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5808">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5808">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5809">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5809">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5810">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5810">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5811">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5811">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5812">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5812">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5813">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5813">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5814">该  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5814">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5815">找到一个  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5815">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5816">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5816">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5817">该  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5817">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Social Security Number (TAJ) -->
      <Entity id="0de78315-9537-47f5-95ab-b3e77eba3993" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5837">匈牙利税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5837">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5838">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5838">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5839">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5839">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5840">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5840">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5841">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5841">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5842">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5842">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5843">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5843">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5844">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5844">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5845">10 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5845">10 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5846">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5846">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5847">10 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5847">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5848">一个数字，必须为"8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5848">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5849">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5849">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5850">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5850">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5851">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5851">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5852">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5852">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5853">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5853">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5854">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5854">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5855">该  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5855">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5856">找到一个  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5856">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5857">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5857">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5858">该  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5858">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5884">匈牙利增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5884">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5885">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5885">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5886">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5886">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5887">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5887">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5888">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5888">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5889">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5889">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5890">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5890">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5891">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5891">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5892">10 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5892">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5893">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5893">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5894">10 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5894">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5895">两个字母 - HU 或 hu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5895">two letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5896">可选空间</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5896">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5897">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5897">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5898">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5898">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5899">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5899">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5900">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5900">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5901">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5901">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5902">函数Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5902">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5903">找到来自Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5903">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5904">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5904">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5905">函数Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5905">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5906">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5906">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_hungary_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5907">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5907">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5910">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5910">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5911">vatno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5911">vatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5912">hungarianvatno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5912">hungarianvatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5913">tax no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5913">tax no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5914">增值税 áfa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5914">value added tax áfa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5915">közösségi adószám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5915">közösségi adószám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5916">általáos forgalmi adó szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5916">általános forgalmi adó szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5917">hozzáadottottottték adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5917">hozzáadottérték adó</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5918">áfa szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5918">áfa szám</span></span>


## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5919">PAN (印度永久) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5919">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5920">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5920">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5921">10 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5921">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5922">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5922">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5923">10 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5923">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5924">三个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5924">Three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5925">C、P、H、F、A、T、B、L、J、G (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5925">A letter in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5926">一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5926">A letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5927">四位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5927">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5928">字母检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5928">A letter that is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5929">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5929">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5930">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5930">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5931">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5931">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5932">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5932">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5933">正则表达式 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5933">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5934">找到 Keyword_india_permanent_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5934">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5935">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其可信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5935">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5936">正则表达式 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5936">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
      <Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3520.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5937">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5937">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5938">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5938">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5939">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5939">Permanent Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5940">PAN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5940">PAN</span></span> 
   
## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5941">印度唯一标识 (Aadhaar) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5941">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5942">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5942">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5943">12 个数字（包含可选空格或短划线）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5943">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5944">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5944">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5945">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5945">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5946">不是 0 或 1 的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5946">A digit which is not 0 or 1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5947">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5947">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5948">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5948">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5949">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5949">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5950">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5950">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5951">最后一个数字，即检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5951">The final digit, which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5952">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5952">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5953">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5953">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5954">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5954">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5955">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5955">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5956">函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5956">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5957">找到 Keyword_india_aadhar 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5957">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5958">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5958">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5959">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5959">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5960">函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5960">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5961">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5961">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5962">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5962">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5963">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5963">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5964">aadhaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5964">aadhaar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5965">aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5965">aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5966">aadhar#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5966">aadhar#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5967">uid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5967">uid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5968">आधार</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5968">आधार</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5969">uidai</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5969">uidai</span></span>
   
## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5970">印度尼西亚身份证号码 (KTP) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5970">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5971">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5971">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5972">16 个数字（包含可选点）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5972">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5973">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5973">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5974">16 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5974">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5975">两位省代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5975">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5976">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5976">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5977">两位摄政统治区或城市代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5977">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5978">两位住宅小区代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5978">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5979">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5979">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5980">6 个数字，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5980">Six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5981">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5981">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5982">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5982">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5983">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5983">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5984">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5984">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5985">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5985">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5986">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5986">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5987">正则表达式 Regex_indonesia_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5987">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5988">找到 Keyword_indonesia_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5988">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5989">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5989">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5990">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5990">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5991">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5991">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5992">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5992">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5993">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5993">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5994">IBAN (国际) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5994">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5995">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5995">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5996">国家/地区代码（两个字母）加校验位（两个数字）以及 bban 号码（最多 30 个字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5996">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5997">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5997">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5998">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5998">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-5999">两个字母的国家/地区代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-5999">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6000">两个校验位（后跟一个可选空间） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6000">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6001">1-7 个包含 4 个字母或数字的组（可以使用空格进行分隔）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6001">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6002">1-3 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6002">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-p137">每个国家/地区的格式稍有不同。IBAN 敏感信息类型涵盖这 60 个国家/地区：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-p137">The format for each country is slightly different. The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6005">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6005">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6006">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6006">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6007">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6007">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6008">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6008">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6009">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6009">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6010">函数 Func_iban 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6010">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6011">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6011">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6012">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6012">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6013">无</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6013">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6014">ICD-10-CM (国际) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6014">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6015">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6015">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6016">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6016">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6017">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6017">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6018">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6018">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6019">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6019">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6020">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6020">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6021">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6021">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6022">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6022">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6023">找到来自Dictionary_icd_10_updated的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6023">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6024">找到来自Dictionary_icd_10_codes的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6024">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6025">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6025">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6026">找到更新Dictionary_icd_10_关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6026">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6027">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6027">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6028">来自 Dictionary_icd_10_updated 关键字词典的任何术语，该词典基于国际医学分类、第十次修订、修改 ([ICD-10-CM) 。 ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6028">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6029">此类型仅查找该术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6029">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6030">来自 Dictionary_icd_10_codes 关键字词典的任何术语，该词典基于国际医学分类、第十次修订、修改 ([ICD-10-CM) 。 ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6030">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6031">此类型仅查找保险代码，而不是说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6031">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6032">ICD-9-CM (国际) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6032">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6033">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6033">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6034">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6034">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6035">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6035">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6036">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6036">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6037">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6037">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6038">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6038">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6039">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6039">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6040">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6040">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6041">找到来自Dictionary_icd_9_updated的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6041">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6042">找到来自Dictionary_icd_9_codes的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6042">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6043">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6043">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6044">找到来自Dictionary_icd_9_updated的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6044">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6045">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6045">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6046">来自 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 关键字词典的任何术语，该词典基于国际医学分类、第九次修订、修改 ([ICD-9-CM) 。 ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6046">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6047">此类型仅查找该术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6047">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6048">来自 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 关键字词典的任何术语，该词典基于国际医学分类、第九次修订、修改 ([ICD-9-CM) 。 ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6048">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6049">此类型仅查找保险代码，而不是说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6049">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6050">IP 地址</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6050">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6051">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6051">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6052">IPv4：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6052">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6053">对于 IPv4 地址 () 无格式 (和无格式) 设置格式的复杂模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6053">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6054">IPv6：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6054">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6055">包含带格式的 IPv6 号码的复杂 (包括冒号) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6055">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6056">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6056">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6057">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6057">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6058">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6058">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6059">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6059">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6060">对于 IPv6，如果接近 300 个字符，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6060">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6061">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6061">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6062">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6062">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6063">对于 IPv4，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6063">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6064">正则表达式 Regex_ipv4_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6064">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6065">找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6065">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6066">对于 IPv6，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6066">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6067">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6067">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6068">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6068">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6069">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6069">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6070">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6070">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6071">IP (关键字区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6071">IP (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6072">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6072">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6073">ip addresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6073">ip addresses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6074">internet protocol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6074">internet protocol</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6075">IP-כתובת ה</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6075">IP-כתובת ה</span></span> 

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6076">爱尔兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6076">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6077">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6077">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6078">六个数字后跟四个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6078">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6079">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6079">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6080">六个数字和四个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6080">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6081">六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6081">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6082">四个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6082">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6083">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6083">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6084">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6084">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6085">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6085">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6086">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6086">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6087">正则表达式查找  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6087">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6088">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6088">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="e01bccd9-eb4d-414f-ace1-e9b6a4c4a2ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6212">爱尔兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6212">Ireland passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6213">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6213">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6214">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6214">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6215">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6215">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6216">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6216">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6217">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6217">Two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6218">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6218">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6219">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6219">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6220">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6220">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6221">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6221">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6222">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6222">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6223">正则表达式查找  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6223">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6224">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6224">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6225">正则表达式查找格式 `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` 为 DD MMM/MMM YYYYY (示例 - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) 或找到关键字 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6225">The regular expression `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6226">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6226">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6227">正则表达式查找  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6227">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6228">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6228">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="a2130f27-9ee2-4103-84f9-a6b1ee7d0cbf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6252">爱尔兰个人公共服务 (PPS) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6252">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6253">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6253">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6254">2012 (2012 年 12 月 31) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6254">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6255">七个数字后跟 1-2 个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6255">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6256">2013 年 1 (1 日及之后的新格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6256">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6257">七个数字后跟两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6257">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6258">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6258">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6259">2012 (2012 年 12 月 31) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6259">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6260">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6260">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6261">一到两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6261">one to two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6262">2013 年 1 (1 日及之后的新格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6262">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6263">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6263">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6264">字母 (不区分大小写) 字母检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6264">a letter (not case-sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6265">A-I 或"W"范围中的可选字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6265">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6266">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6266">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6267">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6267">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6268">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6268">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6269">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6269">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6270">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6270">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6271">找到来自Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6271">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6272">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6272">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6273">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其可信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6273">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6274">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6274">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6275">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6275">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6320">以色列银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6320">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6321">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6321">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6322">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6322">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6323">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6323">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6324">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6324">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6325">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6325">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6326">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6326">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6327">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6327">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6328">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6328">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6329">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6329">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6330">无格式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6330">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6331">	13 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6331">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6332">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6332">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6333">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6333">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6334">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6334">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6335">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6335">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6336">正则表达式 Regex_israel_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6336">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6337">找到 Keyword_israel_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6337">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6338">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6338">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6339">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6339">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6340">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6340">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6341">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6341">Bank Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6342">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6342">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6343">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6343">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6344">以色列国家标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6344">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6345">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6345">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6346">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6346">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6347">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6347">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6348">九个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6348">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6349">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6349">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6350">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6350">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6351">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6351">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6352">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6352">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6353">函数 Func_israeli_national_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6353">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6354">找到 Keyword_Israel_National_ID 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6354">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6355">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6355">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6356">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6356">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6357">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6357">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6358">מספר זהות</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6358">מספר זהות</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6359">מספר זיה וי</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6359">מספר זיה וי</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6360">מספר זיהוי ישר אלי</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6360">מספר זיהוי ישר אלי</span></span>      
-   <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6361">זהותישר אלית</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6361">זהותישר אלית</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6362">هو ية اسرائيل ية عدد</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6362">هو ية اسرائيل ية عدد</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6363">هوية إسرائ يلية</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6363">هوية إسرائ يلية</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6364">رقم الهوية</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6364">رقم الهوية</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6365">عدد هوية فريدة من نوعها</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6365">عدد هوية فريدة من نوعها</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6366">idnumber#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6366">idnumber#</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6367">id 号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6367">id number</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6368">identity no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6368">identity no</span></span>        
-   <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6369">identitynumber#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6369">identitynumber#</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6370">标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6370">identity number</span></span>

## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6374">意大利驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6374">Italy driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6375">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驾驶证号码敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6375">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6376">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6376">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6377">10 个字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6377">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6378">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6378">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6379">10 个字母和数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6379">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6380">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6380">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6381">字母"A"或"V" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6381">the letter "A" or "V" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6382">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6382">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6383">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6383">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6384">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6384">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6385">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6385">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6386">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6386">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6387">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6387">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6388">正则表达式查找 `Regex_italy_drivers_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6388">The regular expression `Regex_italy_drivers_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6389">找到或 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6389">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
    <Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6516">意大利财政代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6516">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6517">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6517">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6518">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6518">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6519">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6519">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6520">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6520">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6521">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6521">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6522">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6522">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6523">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6523">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6524">指定模式中字母和数字的 16 个字符的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6524">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6525">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6525">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6526">字母和数字的 16 个字符组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6526">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6527">与系列名称中的前三个辅音对应的三个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6527">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6528">第一个名称中第一个、第三个和第四个辅音对应的三个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6528">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6529">与出生日期的最后一个数字对应的两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6529">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6530">一个字母对应于出生日期的字母 - 字母按字母顺序使用，但只有字母 A 到 E、H、L、M、P、R 到 T (因此，1 月是 A，10 月是 R) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6530">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (so, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6531">对应于当月出生日期的两个数字-为了区分性别，将 40 添加到性别的出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6531">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6532">四个数字，对应于国家/地区代码 (国家/地区代码时，该人员所) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6532">four digits that correspond to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6533">一个奇偶校验数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6533">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6534">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6534">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6535">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6535">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6536">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6536">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6537">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6537">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6538">该  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6538">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6539">找到一个  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6539">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6540">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6540">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6541">该  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6541">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
