## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6576">意大利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6576">Italy passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6577">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6577">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6578">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6578">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6579">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6579">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6580">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6580">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6581">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6581">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6582">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6582">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6583">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6583">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6584">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6584">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6585">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6585">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6586">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6586">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6587">正则表达式查找  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6587">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6588">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6588">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6589">正则表达式查找 `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YYYY (示例 - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) 或找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字的日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6589">The regular expression `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6590">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6590">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6591">正则表达式查找  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6591">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6592">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6592">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="39811019-4750-445f-b26d-4c0e6c431544" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6593">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6593">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number_common"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6594">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6594">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6595">passport#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6595">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6596">passport#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6596">passport #</span></span>

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6616">意大利增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6616">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6617">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6617">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6618">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6618">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6619">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6619">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6620">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6620">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6621">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6621">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6622">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6622">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6623">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6623">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6624">带可选分隔符的 13 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6624">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6625">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6625">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6626">带可选分隔符的 13 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6626">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6627">I 或 i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6627">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6628">T 或 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6628">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6629">可选空格、点、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6629">optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6630">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6630">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6631">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6631">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6632">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6632">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6633">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6633">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6634">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6634">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6635">函数Func_italy_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6635">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6636">找到来自Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6636">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6637">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6637">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6638">函数Func_italy_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6638">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6640">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6640">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6643">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6643">vat#</span></span>

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6646">日本银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6646">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6647">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6647">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6648">七个或八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6648">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6649">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6649">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6650">bank account number：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6650">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6651">七个或八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6651">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6652">bank account branch code：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6652">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6653">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6653">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6654">可选 (或短划线) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6654">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6655">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6655">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6656">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6656">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6657">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6657">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6658">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6658">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6659">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6659">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6660">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6660">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6661">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6661">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6662">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6662">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6663">函数 Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6663">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6664">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6664">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6665">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6665">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6666">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6666">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6667">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6667">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6714">日本驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6714">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6715">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6715">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6716">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6716">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6717">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6717">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6718">12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6718">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6719">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6719">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6720">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6720">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6721">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6721">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6722">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6722">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6723">函数 Func_jp_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6723">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6724">找到 Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6724">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6762">日本我的号码 - 公司</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6762">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6763">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6763">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6764">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6764">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6765">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6765">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6766">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6766">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6767">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6767">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6768">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6768">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6769">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6769">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6770">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6770">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6771">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6771">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6772">13 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6772">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6773">一位到九位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6773">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6774">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6774">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6775">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6775">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6776">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6776">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6777">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6777">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6778">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6778">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6779">函数Func_japanese_my_number_corporate查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6779">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6780">找到来自Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6780">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6781">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6781">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6782">函数Func_japanese_my_number_corporate查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6782">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6783">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6783">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_japan_my_number_corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6784">Keyword_japan_my_number_corporate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6784">Keyword_japan_my_number_corporate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6785">公司编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6785">corporate number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6786">マイナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6786">マイナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6787">共通番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6787">共通番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6788">マイナンバーカード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6788">マイナンバーカード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6789">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6789">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6790">個人番号カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6790">個人番号カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6791">個人識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6791">個人識別番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6792">個人識別ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6792">個人識別ナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6793">法人番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6793">法人番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6794">指定通知書</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6794">指定通知書</span></span>


## <a name="japan-my-number---personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6795">日本我的号码 - 个人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6795">Japan My Number - Personal</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6796">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6796">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6797">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6797">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6798">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6798">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6799">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6799">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6800">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6800">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6801">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6801">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6802">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6802">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6803">12 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6803">12-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6804">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6804">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6805">12 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6805">12-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6806">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6806">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6807">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6807">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6808">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6808">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6809">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6809">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6810">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6810">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6811">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6811">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6812">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6812">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6813">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6813">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6814">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6814">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6815">函数Func_japanese_my_number_personal查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6815">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6816">找到来自Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6816">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6817">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其可信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6817">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6818">函数Func_japanese_my_number_personal查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6818">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6831">日本护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6831">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6832">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6832">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6833">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6833">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6834">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6834">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6835">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6835">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6836">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6836">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6837">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6837">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6838">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6838">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6839">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6839">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6840">函数 Func_jp_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6840">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6841">找到 Keyword_jp_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6841">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6842">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6842">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6843">Keyword_jp_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6843">Keyword_jp_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6845">Passport Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6845">Passport Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6846">Passport No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6846">Passport No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6847">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6847">Passport #</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6850">パスポートナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6850">パスポートナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6851">パスポート＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6851">パスポート＃</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6852">パスポート#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6852">パスポート#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6853">パスポパスポno。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6853">パスポートNo.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6854">旅券番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6854">旅券番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6855">旅券番号＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6855">旅券番号＃</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6856">旅券番号♯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6856">旅券番号♯</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6857">旅券ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6857">旅券ナンバー</span></span>


## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6858">日本居民身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6858">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6859">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6859">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6860">12 个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6860">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6861">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6861">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6862">12 个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6862">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6863">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6863">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6864">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6864">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6865">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6865">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6866">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6866">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6867">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6867">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6868">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6868">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6869">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6869">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6870">正则表达式Regex_jp_residence_card_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6870">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6871">找到来自Keyword_jp_residence_card_number的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6871">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6872">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6872">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6873">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6873">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6874">住宅卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6874">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6875">居住卡否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6875">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6876">居住卡#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6876">Residence card #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6877">在留カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6877">在留カード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6878">在留カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6878">在留カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6879">在留番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6879">在留番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6880">日本居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6880">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6881">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6881">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6882">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6882">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6883">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6883">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6884">11 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6884">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6885">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6885">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6886">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6886">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6887">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6887">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6888">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6888">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6889">函数 Func_jp_resident_registration_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6889">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6890">找到 Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6890">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6891">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6891">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_resident_registration_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6892">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6892">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6893">Resident Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6893">Resident Registration Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6894">Residents Basic Registry Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6894">Residents Basic Registry Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6895">Resident Registration No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6895">Resident Registration No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6896">Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6896">Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6897">Residents Basic Registry No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6897">Residents Basic Registry No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6898">Basic Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6898">Basic Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6899">外国人登録証明書番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6899">外国人登録証明書番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6900">証明書番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6900">証明書番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6901">登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6901">登録番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6902">外国人登録証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6902">外国人登録証</span></span>

   
## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6903">日本社会保险号码 (SIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6903">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6904">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6904">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6905">7-12 个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6905">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6906">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6906">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6907">7-12 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6907">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6908">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6908">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6909">可选连字符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6909">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6910">六位数字 OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6910">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6911">7-12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6911">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6912">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6912">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6913">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6913">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6914">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6914">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6915">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6915">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6916">函数 Func_jp_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6916">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6917">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6917">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6918">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6918">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6919">函数 Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6919">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6920">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6920">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6921">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6921">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6922">Keyword_jp_sin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6922">Keyword_jp_sin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6923">Social Insurance No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6923">Social Insurance No.</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6941">拉脱维亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6941">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6942">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6942">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6943">三个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6943">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6944">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6944">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6945">三个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6945">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6946">三个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6946">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6947">六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6947">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6948">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6948">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6949">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6949">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6950">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6950">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6951">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6951">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6952">正则表达式查找  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6952">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-6953">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-6953">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7078">拉脱维亚个人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7078">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7079">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7079">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7080">11 个数字和一个可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7080">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7081">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7081">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7082">旧格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7082">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7083">11 个数字和一个连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7083">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7084">对应于 DDMMYY (出生日期的六) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7084">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7085">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7085">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7086">一个数字，对应于 19 世纪 ("0"，"1"表示 20 世纪，"2"表示 21 世纪) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7086">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7087">四个数字，随机生成</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7087">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7088">新格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7088">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7089">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7089">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7090">两个数字"32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7090">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7091">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7091">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7092">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7092">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7093">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7093">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7094">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7094">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7095">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7095">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7096">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 或正则表达式 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7096">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7097">找到一个  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7097">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7098">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7098">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7099">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 或正则表达式 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7099">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7162">拉脱维亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7162">Latvia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7163">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7163">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7164">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7164">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7165">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7165">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7166">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7166">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7167">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7167">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7168">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7168">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7169">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7169">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7170">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7170">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7171">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7171">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7172">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7172">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7173">正则表达式查找  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7173">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7174">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7174">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7175">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` DD.MM.YYYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7175">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7176">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7176">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7177">正则表达式查找  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7177">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7178">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7178">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="23ae25ec-cc28-421b-b77a-3054eadf1ede" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7201">立陶宛驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7201">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7202">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7202">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7203">不带空格和分隔符的八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7203">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7204">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7204">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7205">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7205">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7206">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7206">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7207">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7207">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7208">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7208">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7209">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7209">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7210">正则表达式查找  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7210">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7211">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7211">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="86f7628b-e0f4-4dc3-9fbc-e4300e4c7d78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7336">立陶宛个人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7336">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7337">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7337">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7338">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7338">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7339">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7339">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7340">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7340">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7341">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7341">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7342">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7342">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7343">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7343">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7344">不带空格和分隔符的 11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7344">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7345">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7345">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7346">11 个数字，不带空格和分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7346">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7347">1 (1-6) 对应于性别和出生日期的世纪</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7347">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7348">对应于 YYMMDD (出生日期的六) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7348">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7349">三个数字，对应于出生日期的序列号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7349">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7350">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7350">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7351">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7351">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7352">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7352">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7353">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7353">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7354">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7354">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7355">该  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7355">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7356">找到一个  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7356">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7357">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7357">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7358">该  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7358">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7393">立陶宛护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7393">Lithuania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7394">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7394">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7395">八个数字或字母，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7395">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7396">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7396">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7397">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7397">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7398">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7398">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7399">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7399">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7400">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7400">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7401">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7401">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7402">正则表达式查找  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7402">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7403">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7403">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7404">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` DD MM YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7404">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7405">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7405">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7406">正则表达式查找  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7406">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7407">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7407">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1b79900f-047b-4c3f-846f-7d73b5534bce" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7427">都明网驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7427">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7428">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7428">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7429">不带空格和分隔符的六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7429">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7430">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7430">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7431">六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7431">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7432">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7432">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7433">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7433">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7434">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7434">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7435">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7435">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7436">正则表达式查找  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7436">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7437">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7437">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7561"> (的自然人的) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7561">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7562">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7562">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7563">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7563">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7564">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7564">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7565">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7565">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7566">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7566">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7567">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7567">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7568">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7568">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7569">13 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7569">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7570">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7570">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7571">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7571">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7572">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7572">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7573">两个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7573">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7574">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7574">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7575">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7575">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7576">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7576">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7577">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7577">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7578">该  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7578">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7579">找到一个  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7579">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7580">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7580">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7581">该  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7581">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7604">比塞明卡护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7604">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7605">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7605">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7606">八个数字或字母，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7606">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7607">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7607">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7608">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7608">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7609">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7609">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7610">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7610">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7611">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7611">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7612">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7612">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7613">正则表达式查找  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7613">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7614">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7614">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7615">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` DD MM YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7615">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7616">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7616">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7617">正则表达式查找  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7617">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7618">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7618">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="81d5c027-bed9-4421-91a0-3b2e55b3eb85" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
