## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7650"> (非自然人的) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7650">Luxemburg national identification number (non-natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7651">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7651">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7652">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7652">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7653">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7653">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7654">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7654">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7655">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7655">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7656">可选空间</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7656">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7657">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7657">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7658">可选空间</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7658">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7659">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7659">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7660">可选空间</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7660">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7661">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7661">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7662">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7662">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7663">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7663">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7664">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7664">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7665">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7665">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7666">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7666">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7667">该  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7667">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7668">找到一个  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7668">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7669">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7669">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7670">该  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7670">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7710">马来西亚身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7710">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7711">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7711">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7712">12 个数字（包含可选连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7712">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7713">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7713">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7714">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7714">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7715">格式为 YYMMDD 的六位数字，即出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7715">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7716">短划线 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7716">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7717">两个字母的出生日期代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7717">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7718">短划线 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7718">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7719">三个随机数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7719">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7720">一位数的性别代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7720">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7721">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7721">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7722">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7722">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7723">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7723">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7724">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7724">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7725">正则表达式 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7725">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7726">找到 Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7726">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7753">马耳他驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7753">Malta driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7754">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7754">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7755">指定模式中两个字符和六个数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7755">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7756">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7756">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7757">两个字符和六个数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7757">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7758">两个字符 (或字母，不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7758">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7759">可选 (空格) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7759">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7760">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7760">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7761">可选 (空格) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7761">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7762">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7762">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7763">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7763">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7764">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7764">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7765">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7765">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7766">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7766">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7767">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7767">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7768">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7768">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="a3bdaa4a-8371-4735-8fa5-56ee0fb4afc4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7892">马耳他身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7892">Malta identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7893">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7893">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7894">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7894">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7895">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7895">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7896">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7896">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7897">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7897">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7898">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7898">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7899">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7899">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7900">七个数字后跟一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7900">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7901">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7901">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7902">七个数字后跟一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7902">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7903">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7903">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7904">"M、G、A、P、L、H、B、Z"中的一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7904">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7905">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7905">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7906">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7906">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7907">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7907">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7908">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7908">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7909">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7909">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7910">找到一个  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7910">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7911">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其可信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7911">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7912">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7912">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7918">kodiċi数字个人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7918">kodiċi numerali personali</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7920">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7920">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7921">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7921">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7922">numru ta' identita uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7922">numru ta' identità uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7923">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7923">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7924">numru tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7924">numru tat-taxxa</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7926">唯一标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7926">unique identification number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7928">uniqueidentityno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7928">uniqueidentityno#</span></span>


## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7929">马耳他护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7929">Malta passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7930">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7930">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7931">不带空格或分隔符的七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7931">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7932">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7932">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7933">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7933">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7934">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7934">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7935">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7935">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7936">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7936">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7937">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7937">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7938">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7938">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7939">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7939">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7940">找到来自 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7940">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7941">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7941">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7942">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7942">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7943">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7943">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="b2b21198-48f9-4d13-b2a5-03969bff0fb8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7956">Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7956">Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_date"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7960">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7960">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7961">问题日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7961">date of issue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7962">到期日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7962">date of expiry</span></span>


## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7963">马耳他税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7963">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7964">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7964">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7965">对于马耳他语的护照：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7965">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7966">指定模式中七个数字和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7966">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7967">非马耳他语国家/省/市</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7967">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7968">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7968">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7969">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7969">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7970">马耳他语：七位数字和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7970">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7971">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7971">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7972">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7972">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7973">非马耳他公民和马耳他实体：9 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7973">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7974">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7974">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7975">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7975">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7976">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7976">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7977">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7977">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7978">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7978">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7979">正则表达式或  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7979">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7980">找到一个  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7980">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7981">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其可信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7981">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7982">正则表达式或  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7982">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7983">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7983">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-7992">numru ta' identita uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-7992">numru ta' identità uniku</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8015">荷兰公民服务 (BSN) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8015">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8016">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8016">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8017">包含可选空格的八个或九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8017">eight or nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8018">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8018">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8019">8-9 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8019">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8020">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8020">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8021">可选 (空格) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8021">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8022">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8022">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8023">可选 (空格) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8023">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8024">两位三位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8024">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8025">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8025">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8026">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8026">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8027">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8027">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8028">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8028">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8029">函数 Func_netherlands_bsn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8029">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8030">找到 Keyword_netherlands_bsn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8030">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8031">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8031">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8032">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8032">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8033">Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8033">Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8034">bsn#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8034">bsn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8035">bsn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8035">bsn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8036">servicenummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8036">burgerservicenummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8037">公民服务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8037">citizen service number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8038">人员编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8038">person number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8039">个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8039">personal number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8040">个人数字代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8040">personal numeric code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8041">与人员相关的号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8041">person-related number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8042">persoonlijk nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8042">persoonlijk nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8043">persoonlijke numerieke 代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8043">persoonlijke numerieke code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8044">persoonsgeoonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8044">persoonsgebonden</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8045">persoonsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8045">persoonsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8046">sociaal-fiscaal nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8046">sociaal-fiscaal nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8047">social-fiscal number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8047">social-fiscal number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8048">sofi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8048">sofi</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8049">sofinummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8049">sofinummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8050">uniek identificatienummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8050">uniek identificatienummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8051">uniek identiteitsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8051">uniek identiteitsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8052">唯一标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8052">unique identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8053">唯一标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8053">unique identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8054">uniqueidentityno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8054">uniqueidentityno#</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8055">荷兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8055">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8056">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8056">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8057">10 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8057">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8058">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8058">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8059">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8059">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8060">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8060">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8061">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8061">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8062">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8062">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8063">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8063">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8064">正则表达式查找  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8064">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8065">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8065">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="6247fbea-ab80-4be5-8233-308b7c031401" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
```

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8196">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8196">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8197">九个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8197">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8198">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8198">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8199">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8199">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8200">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8200">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8201">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8201">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8202">正则表达式查找  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8202">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8203">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8203">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8204">正则表达式查找格式 `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` 为 DD MMM/MMM YYYYY (示例 - 26 MAA/MAR 2012) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8204">The regular expression `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8205">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8205">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8206">正则表达式查找  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8206">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8207">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8207">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61786727-bafd-45f6-94d9-888d815e228e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8225">荷兰税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8225">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8226">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8226">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8227">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8227">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8228">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8228">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8229">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8229">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8230">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8230">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8231">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8231">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8232">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8232">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8233">不带空格或分隔符的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8233">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8234">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8234">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8235">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8235">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8236">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8236">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8237">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8237">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8238">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8238">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8239">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8239">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8240">该  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8240">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8241">找到一个  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8241">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8242">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其可信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8242">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8243">该  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8243">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8281">荷兰增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8281">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8282">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8282">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8283">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8283">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8284">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8284">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8285">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8285">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8286">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8286">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8287">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8287">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8288">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8288">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8289">14 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8289">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8290">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8290">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8291">14 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8291">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8292">N 或 n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8292">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8293">L 或 l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8293">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8294">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8294">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8295">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8295">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8296">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8296">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8297">B 或 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8297">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8298">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8298">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8299">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8299">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8300">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8300">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8301">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8301">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8302">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8302">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8303">函数Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8303">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8304">找到来自Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8304">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8305">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8305">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8306">函数Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8306">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8315">新西兰银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8315">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8316">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8316">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8317">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8317">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8318">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8318">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8319">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8319">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8320">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8320">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8321">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8321">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8322">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8322">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8323">具有可选分隔符的 14 位到 16 位模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8323">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8324">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8324">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8325">带可选分隔符的 14 位到 16 位模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8325">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8326">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8326">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8327">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8327">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8328">三到四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8328">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8329">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8329">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8330">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8330">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8331">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8331">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8332">两到三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8332">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8333">选项连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8333">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8334">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8334">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8335">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8335">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8336">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8336">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8337">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8337">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8338">函数Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8338">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8339">找到来自Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8339">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8340">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8340">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8341">函数Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8341">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zFealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8342">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8342">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8343">Keyword_new_zealand_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8343">Keyword_new_zealand_bank_account_number</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8349">新西兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8349">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8350">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8350">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8351">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8351">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8352">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8352">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8353">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8353">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8354">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8354">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8355">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8355">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8356">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8356">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8357">八字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8357">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8358">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8358">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8359">八字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8359">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8360">两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8360">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8361">六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8361">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8362">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8362">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8363">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8363">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8364">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8364">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8365">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8365">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8366">函数Func_newzealand_driver_license_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8366">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8367">找到来自Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8367">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8368">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其可信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8368">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8369">函数Func_newzealand_driver_license_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8369">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8436">新西兰的收入数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8436">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8437">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8437">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8438">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8438">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8439">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8439">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8440">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8440">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8441">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8441">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8442">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8442">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8443">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8443">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8444">带可选分隔符的八个或九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8444">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8445">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8445">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8446">带可选分隔符的八个或九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8446">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8447">两个或三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8447">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8448">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8448">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8449">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8449">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8450">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8450">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8451">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8451">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8452">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8452">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8453">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8453">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8454">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8454">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8455">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8455">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8456">函数Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8456">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8457">找到来自Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8457">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8458">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8458">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8459">函数Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8459">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8460">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8460">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8461">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8461">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8462">ird no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8462">ird no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8463">ird no#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8463">ird no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8464">nz ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8464">nz ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8465">新西兰 ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8465">new zealand ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8466">ird number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8466">ird number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8467">税收收入数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8467">inland revenue number</span></span>


## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8468">新西兰卫生服务局号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8468">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8469">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8469">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8470">三个字母，一个 (可选) ，四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8470">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8471">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8471">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8472">三个字母 (区分大小写) "I"和"O"除外</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8472">three letters (not case-sensitive) except 'I' and 'O'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8473">可选 (空格) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8473">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8474">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8474">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8475">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8475">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8476">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8476">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8477">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8477">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8478">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8478">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8479">函数 Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8479">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8480">找到 Keyword_nz_terms 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8480">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8481">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8481">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8482">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8482">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8483">函数 Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8483">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8484">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8484">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
    <Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
       </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-social-welfare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8498">新西兰社会社会保险号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8498">New Zealand social welfare number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8499">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8499">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8500">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8500">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8501">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8501">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8502">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8502">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8503">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8503">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8504">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8504">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8505">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8505">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8506">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8506">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8507">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8507">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8508">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8508">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8509">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8509">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8510">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8510">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8511">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8511">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8512">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8512">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8513">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8513">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8514">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8514">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8515">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8515">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8516">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8516">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8517">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8517">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8518">函数Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8518">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8519">找到来自Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8519">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8520">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其可信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8520">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8521">函数Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8521">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8522">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8522">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8523">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8523">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8524">社交社会保险#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8524">social welfare #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8525">社交社会保险#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8525">social welfare#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8526">社交支出否。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8526">social welfare No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8527">社交社会保险号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8527">social welfare number</span></span>

## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8529">挪威标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8529">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8530">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8530">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8531">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8531">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8532">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8532">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8533">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8533">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8534">六个数字，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8534">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8535">三位数个人编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8535">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8536">两个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8536">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8537">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8537">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8538">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8538">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8539">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8539">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8540">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8540">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8541">函数 Func_norway_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8541">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8542">找到 Keyword_norway_id_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8542">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8543">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8543">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8544">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8544">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8545">函数 Func_norway_id_numbe 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8545">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8546">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8546">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8547">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8547">Keywords</span></span>
