- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8549">Personal identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8549">Personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8550">Norwegian ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8550">Norwegian ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8551">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8551">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8552">标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8552">Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8553">Personnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8553">Personnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8554">Fselsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8554">Fødselsnummer</span></span>

   
## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8555">菲律宾统一的多用途标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8555">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8556">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8556">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8557">12 个数字，通过连字符分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8557">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8558">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8558">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8559">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8559">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8560">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8560">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8561">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8561">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8562">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8562">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8563">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8563">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8564">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8564">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8565">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8565">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8566">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8566">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8567">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8567">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8568">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8568">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8569">正则表达式 Regex_philippines_unified_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8569">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8570">找到 Keyword_philippines_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8570">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8571">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8571">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8572">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8572">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8573">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8573">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8574">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8574">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8575">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8575">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8576">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8576">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8577">波兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8577">Poland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8578">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8578">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8579">包含两个正斜杠的 14 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8579">14 digits containing two forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8580">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8580">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8581">14 个数字和两个正斜杠：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8581">14 digits and two forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8582">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8582">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8583">正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8583">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8584">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8584">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8585">正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8585">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8586">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8586">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8587">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8587">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8588">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8588">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8589">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8589">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8590">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8590">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8591">正则表达式查找  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8591">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8592">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8592">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8716">波兰身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8716">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8717">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8717">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8718">三个字母和六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8718">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8719">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8719">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8720">三个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8720">three letters (not case-sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8721">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8721">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8722">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8722">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8723">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8723">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8724">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8724">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8725">函数 Func_polish_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8725">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8726">找到 Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8726">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8727">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8727">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8728">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8728">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8729">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8729">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8731">Numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8731">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8732">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8732">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8733">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8733">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8734">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8734">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8735">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8735">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8736">。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8736">dow.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8737">os。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8737">os.</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8738">波兰国家/ (PESEL) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8738">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8739">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8739">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8740">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8740">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8741">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8741">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8742">6 个数字，表示 YYMMDD 格式的出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8742">six digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8743">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8743">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8744">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8744">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8745">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8745">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8746">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8746">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8747">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8747">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8748">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8748">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8749">函数 Func_pesel_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8749">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8750">找到 Keyword_pesel_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8750">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8751">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8751">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8752">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8752">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8753">函数 Func_pesel_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8753">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8754">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8754">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8755">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8755">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_pesel_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8756">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8756">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8757">dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8757">dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8758">dowódosobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8758">dowódosobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8759">niepowtarzalny numer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8759">niepowtarzalny numer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8760">niepowtarzalnynumer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8760">niepowtarzalnynumer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8761">nr.-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8761">nr.-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8762">nr-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8762">nr-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8763">numer identyfikacyjny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8763">numer identyfikacyjny</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8764">pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8764">pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8765">tożsamości narodowej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8765">tożsamości narodowej</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8766">波兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8766">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8767">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8767">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8768">它作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8768">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8769">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8769">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8770">两个字母和七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8770">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8771">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8771">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8772">两个字母 (区分大小写) 后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8772">Two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8773">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8773">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8774">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8774">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8775">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8775">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8776">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8776">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8777">该 `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8777">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8778">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8778">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8779">找到或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8779">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8780">找到一个 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8780">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8781">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8781">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8782">该 `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8782">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8783">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8783">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8784">找到或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8784">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8785">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其可信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8785">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8786">该 `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8786">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8787">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8787">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8813">波兰 REGON 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8813">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8814">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8814">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8815">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8815">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8816">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8816">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8817">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8817">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8818">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8818">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8819">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8819">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8820">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8820">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8821">9 位或 14 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8821">9-digit or 14-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8822">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8822">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8823">九位数字或 14 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8823">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8824">九位数字或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8824">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8825">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8825">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8826">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8826">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8827">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8827">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8828">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8828">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8829">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8829">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8830">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8830">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8831">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8831">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8832">函数Func_polish_regon_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8832">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8833">找到来自Keywords_polish_regon_number的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8833">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8834">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其可信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8834">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8835">函数Func_polish_regon_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8835">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8836">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8836">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_poland_regon_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8837">Keywords_poland_regon_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8837">Keywords_poland_regon_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8838">regon id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8838">regon id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8839">统计数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8839">statistical number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8840">统计 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8840">statistical id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8841">统计否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8841">statistical no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8842">regon 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8842">regon number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8843">reg一d#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8843">regonid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8844">regonno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8844">regonno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8845">公司 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8845">company id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8846">companyid#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8846">companyid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8847">companyidno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8847">companyidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8848">numer statystyczny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8848">numer statystyczny</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8849">numeru regon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8849">numeru regon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8850">numerstatystyczny#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8850">numerstatystyczny#</span></span>

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8852">波兰税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8852">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8853">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8853">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8854">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8854">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8855">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8855">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8856">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8856">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8857">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8857">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8858">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8858">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8859">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8859">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8860">11 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8860">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8861">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8861">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8862">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8862">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8863">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8863">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8864">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8864">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8865">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8865">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8866">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8866">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8867">该  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8867">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8868">找到一个  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8868">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8898">葡萄牙公民卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8898">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8899">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8899">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8900">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8900">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8901">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8901">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8902">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8902">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8903">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8903">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8904">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8904">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8905">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8905">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8906">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8906">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8907">正则表达式 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8907">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8908">找到 Keyword_portugal_citizen_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8908">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8928">葡萄牙驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8928">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8929">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8929">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8930">两个模式 - 两个字母后跟 5-8 个数字（带特殊字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8930">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8931">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8931">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8932">模式 1：两个字母后跟 5/6 特殊字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8932">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8933">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8933">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8934">一个连字符 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8934">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8935">五个或六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8935">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8936">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8936">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8937">一位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8937">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8938">模式 2：一个字母后跟 6/8 个数字（带特殊字符）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8938">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8939">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8939">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8940">一个连字符 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8940">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8941">六个或八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8941">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8942">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8942">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8943">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8943">One digit</span></span>

    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8944">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8945">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8945">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8946">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8947">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8947">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8948">正则表达式查找  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8948">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8949">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8949">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8950">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8950">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8951">Keywords_eu_driver s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8951">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8952">driverlic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8952">driverlic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8953">driverlics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8953">driverlics</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8954">driverlicense</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8954">driverlicense</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8955">driverlicenses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8955">driverlicenses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8956">driverlicence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8956">driverlicence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8957">driverlicences</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8957">driverlicences</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8958">驱动程序 lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8958">driver lic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8959">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8959">driver lics</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-8960">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-8960">driver license</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9081">葡萄牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9081">Portugal passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9082">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9082">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9083">一个字母后跟六个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9083">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9084">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9084">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9085">一个字母后跟六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9085">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9086">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9086">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9087">六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9087">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9088">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9088">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9089">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9089">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9090">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9090">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9091">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9091">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9092">正则表达式查找  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9092">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9093">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9093">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9094">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` DD.MM.YYYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9094">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9095">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9095">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9096">正则表达式查找  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9096">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9097">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9097">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="080a52fd-a7bc-431e-b54d-51f08f59db11" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9124">葡萄牙税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9124">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9125">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9125">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9126">九个数字（可选空格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9126">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9127">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9127">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9128">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9128">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9129">可选空间</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9129">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9130">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9130">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9131">可选空间</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9131">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9132">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9132">three digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9133">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9133">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9134">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9134">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9135">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9135">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9136">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9136">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9137">该  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9137">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9138">找到一个  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9138">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9139">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其可信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9139">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9140">该  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9140">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9165">罗马尼亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9165">Romania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9166">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9166">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9167">一个字符后跟八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9167">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9168">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9168">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9169">一个字符后跟八个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9169">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9170">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9170">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9171">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9171">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9172">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9172">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9173">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9173">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9174">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9174">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9175">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9175">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9176">正则表达式查找  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9176">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9177">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9177">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9181">driverlics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9181">driverlics</span></span>

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9305">罗马尼亚个人数字代码 (CNP) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9305">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9306">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9306">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9307">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9307">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9308">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9308">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9309">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9309">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9310">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9310">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9311">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9311">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9312">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9312">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9313">不带空格和分隔符的 13 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9313">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9314">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9314">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9315">1-9 中的一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9315">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9316">表示 YYMMDD (出生日期的六) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9316">six digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9317">两个数字，可以是 01-52 或 99</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9317">two digits, which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9318">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9318">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9319">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9319">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9320">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9320">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9321">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9321">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9322">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9322">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9323">该  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9323">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9324">找到一个  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9324">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9325">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9325">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9326">该  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9326">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9377">罗马尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9377">Romania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9378">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9378">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9379">八个或九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9379">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9380">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9380">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9381">八个或九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9381">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9382">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9382">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9383">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9383">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9384">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9384">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9385">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9385">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9386">正则表达式查找  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9386">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9387">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9387">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9388">正则表达式查找 `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YY (示例- 01 二月/二月 10) 找到的日期或关键字 `Keywords_eu_passport_date`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9388">The regular expression `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (Example- 01 FEB/FEB 10) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9389">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9389">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9390">正则表达式查找  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9390">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9391">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9391">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5d31b90c-7fe2-4a76-a14b-767b8fd19d6c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9409">俄罗斯护照号码国内</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9409">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9410">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9410">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9411">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9411">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9412">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9412">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9413">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9413">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9414">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9414">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9415">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9415">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9416">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9416">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9417">10 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9417">10-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9418">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9418">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9419">10 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9419">10-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9420">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9420">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9421">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9421">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9422">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9422">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9423">可选空间</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9423">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9424">六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9424">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9425">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9425">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9426">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9426">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9427">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9427">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9428">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9428">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9429">正则表达式Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9429">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9430">找到来自Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9430">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9447">俄罗斯护照号码国际</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9447">Russia passport number international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9448">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9448">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9449">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9449">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9450">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9450">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9451">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9451">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9452">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9452">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9453">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9453">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9454">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9454">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9455">九位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9455">nine-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9456">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9456">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9457">九位数：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9457">nine-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9458">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9458">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9459">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9459">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9460">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9460">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9461">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9461">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9462">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9462">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9463">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9463">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9464">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9464">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9465">正则表达式Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9465">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9466">找到来自Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9466">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9483">沙特阿拉伯国家 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9483">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9484">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9484">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9485">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9485">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9486">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9486">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9487">10 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9487">10 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9488">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9488">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9489">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9489">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9490">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9490">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9491">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9491">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9492">正则表达式 Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9492">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9493">找到 Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9493">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9494">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9494">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9495">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9495">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9498">ID number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9498">ID number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9499">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9499">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span> 

   
## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9500">新加坡国家/ (身份证号码) NRIC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9500">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9501">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9501">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9502">九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9502">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9503">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9503">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9504">九个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9504">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9505">字母"F"、"G"、"S"或"T" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9505">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9506">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9506">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9507">字母检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9507">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9508">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9508">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9509">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9509">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9510">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9510">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9511">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9511">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9512">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9512">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9513">找到 Keyword_singapore_nric 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9513">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9514">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9514">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9515">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9515">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9516">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9516">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9517">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9517">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9518">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9518">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_singapore_nric"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9519">Keyword_singapore_nric</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9519">Keyword_singapore_nric</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9528">斯洛伐克驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9528">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9529">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9529">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9530">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9530">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9531">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9531">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9532">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9532">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9533">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9533">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9534">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9534">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9535">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9535">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9536">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9536">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9537">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9537">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9538">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9538">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9539">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9539">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9540">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9540">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
