## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9666">斯洛伐克个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9666">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9667">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9667">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9668">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9668">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9669">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9669">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9670">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9670">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9671">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9671">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9672">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9672">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9673">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9673">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9674">包含可选反数的九个或十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9674">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9675">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9675">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9676">表示出生日期的六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9676">six digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9677">可选斜杠 (/) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9677">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9678">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9678">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9679">一个可选检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9679">one optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9680">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9680">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9681">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9681">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9682">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9682">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9683">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9683">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9684">该  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9684">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9685">找到一个  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9685">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9686">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其可信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9686">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9687">该  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9687">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9734">斯洛伐克护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9734">Slovakia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9735">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9735">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9736">一个数字或字母后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9736">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9737">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9737">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9738">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9738">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9739">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9739">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9740">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9740">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9741">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9741">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9742">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9742">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9743">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9743">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9744">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9744">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9745">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` DD.MM.YYYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9745">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9746">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9746">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9747">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9747">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9748">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9748">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="238e1f08-d80e-4793-af33-9b57918335b7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9761">Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9761">Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9762">ííslo pasu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9762">číslo pasu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9763">íísla pasov</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9763">čísla pasov</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9764">pas gam.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9764">pas č.</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9770">斯洛文尼亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9770">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9771">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9771">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9772">不带空格和分隔符的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9772">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9773">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9773">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9774">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9774">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9775">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9775">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9776">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9776">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9777">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9777">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9778">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9778">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9779">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9779">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9780">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9780">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5bc089a-f2ee-433d-a6b1-5c253051d6f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9907">斯洛文尼亚唯一主公民编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9907">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9908">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9908">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9909">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9909">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9910">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9910">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9911">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9911">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9912">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9912">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9913">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9913">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9914">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9914">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9915">不带空格或分隔符的 13 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9915">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9916">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9916">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9917">指定模式中有 13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9917">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9918">对应于 DDMMLLL (的七个数字) 其中"LLL"对应于出生日期的最后三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9918">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9919">两个数字，对应于"50"的出生日期区域</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9919">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9920">三个数字，对应于同一天为男性的 (000-499 和 500-999（对于男性）的性别和序列号) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9920">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9921">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9921">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9922">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9922">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9923">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9923">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9924">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9924">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9925">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9925">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9926">该  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9926">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9927">找到一个  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9927">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9928">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9928">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9929">该  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9929">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9957">斯洛文尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9957">Slovenia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9958">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9958">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9959">两个字母后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9959">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9960">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9960">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9961">两个字母后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9961">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9962">字母"P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9962">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9963">一个小写字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9963">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9964">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9964">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9965">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9965">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9966">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9966">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9967">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9967">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9968">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9968">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9969">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9969">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9970">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9970">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9971">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` DD.MM.YYYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9971">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9972">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9972">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9973">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9973">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9974">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9974">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="235b7976-7bbe-4df5-bb40-08678e749d1a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9987">Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9987">Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9988">以tevilka potnega lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9988">številka potnega lista</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9993">以tevilke potnih listov</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9993">številke potnih listov</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_date"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9994">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9994">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9995">问题日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9995">date of issue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9996">到期日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9996">date of expiry</span></span>


## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9997">斯洛文尼亚税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9997">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9998">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9998">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-9999">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-9999">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10000">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10000">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10001">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10001">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10002">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10002">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10003">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10003">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10004">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10004">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10005">没有空格或分隔符的八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10005">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10006">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10006">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10007">1-9 中的一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10007">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10008">六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10008">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10009">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10009">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10010">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10010">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10011">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10011">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10012">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10012">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10013">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10013">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10014">该  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10014">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10015">找到一个  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10015">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10016">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其可信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10016">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10017">该  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10017">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10026">税务标识 no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10026">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10027">税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10027">tax identification number</span></span>

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10041">南非标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10041">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10042">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10042">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10043">13 个数字（可能包含空格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10043">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10044">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10044">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10045">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10045">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10046">格式为 YYMMDD 的六位数字，即出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10046">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10047">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10047">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10048">单数字公民指示符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10048">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10049">数字"8"或"9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10049">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10050">一个数字，即校验和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10050">one digit, which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10051">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10051">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10052">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10052">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10053">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10053">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10054">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10054">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10055">函数 Func_south_africa_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10055">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10056">找到 Keyword_south_africa_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10056">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10057">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10057">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10058">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10058">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_africa_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10059">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10059">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10061">ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10061">ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10062">标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10062">Identification</span></span> 
   
## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10063">韩国居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10063">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10064">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10064">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10065">13 个数字（包含连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10065">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10066">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10066">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10067">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10067">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10068">格式为 YYMMDD 的六位数字，即出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10068">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10069">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10069">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10070">由世纪和性别确定的一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10070">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10071">四位数的出生日期区域代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10071">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10072">一个数字，用于区分前面数字完全相同的人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10072">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10073">一个检查数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10073">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10074">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10074">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10075">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10075">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10076">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10076">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10077">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10077">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10078">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10078">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10079">找到 Keyword_south_korea_resident_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10079">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10080">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10080">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10081">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10081">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10082">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10082">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10083">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10083">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10084">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10084">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10085">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10085">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10086">National ID card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10086">National ID card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10087">Citizen's Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10087">Citizen's Registration Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10088">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10088">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10089">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10089">RRN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10090">주민등록번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10090">주민등록번호</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10091">西班牙驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10091">Spain driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10092">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10092">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10093">八个数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10093">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10094">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10094">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10095">八个数字后跟一个字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10095">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10096">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10096">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10097">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10097">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10098">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10098">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10099">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10099">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10100">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10100">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10101">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10101">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10102">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10102">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10103">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10103">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10104">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10104">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10105">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10105">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10239">西班牙 DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10239">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10240">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10240">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10241">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10241">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10242">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10242">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10243">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10243">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10244">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10244">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10245">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10245">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10246">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10246">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10247">八个数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10247">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10248">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10248">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10249">七个数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10249">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10250">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10250">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10251">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10251">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10252">一个检查 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10252">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10253">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10253">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10254">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10254">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10255">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10255">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10256">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10256">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10257">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10257">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10258">找到一个  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10258">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10259">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10259">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10260">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10260">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10284">西班牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10284">Spain passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10285">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10285">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10286">字母和数字的八字符或九字符组合，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10286">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10287">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10287">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10288">字母和数字的八字符或九字符组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10288">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10289">两个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10289">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10290">一个数字或字母 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10290">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10291">六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10291">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10292">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10292">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10293">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10293">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10294">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10294">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10295">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10295">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10296">正则表达式查找  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10296">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10297">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10297">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10298">正则表达式查找 `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` DD-MM-YYYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10298">The regular expression `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD-MM-YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10299">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10299">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10300">正则表达式查找  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10300">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10301">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10301">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d17a57de-9fa5-4e9f-85d3-85c26d89686e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10326">西班牙护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10326">spain passport</span></span>

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10330">西班牙社会保险号码 (SSN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10330">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10331">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10331">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10332">11-12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10332">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10333">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10333">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10334">11-12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10334">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10335">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10335">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10336">可选 (斜杠) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10336">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10337">七到八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10337">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10338">可选 (斜杠) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10338">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10339">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10339">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10340">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10340">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10341">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10341">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10342">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10342">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10343">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10343">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10344">函数 Func_spanish_social_security_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10344">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10345">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10345">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- - <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10346">找到一个  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10346">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10347">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10347">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10348">函数 Func_spanish_social_security_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10348">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10349">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10349">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Spain SSN -->
    <Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10350">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10350">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_spain_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10351">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10351">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10352">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10352">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10353">ssn#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10353">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10354">socialsecurityno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10354">socialsecurityno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10355">社会保险否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10355">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10356">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10356">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10357">número de la seguridad social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10357">número de la seguridad social</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10358">西班牙税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10358">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10359">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10359">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10360">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10360">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10361">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10361">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10362">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10362">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10363">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10363">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10364">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10364">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10365">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10365">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10366">指定模式中七个或八个数字以及一个或两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10366">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10367">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10367">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10368">具有西班牙国家身份证的西班牙自然人：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10368">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10369">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10369">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10370">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10370">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10371">没有西班牙国家身份证的非居民西班牙人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10371">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10372">一个小写字母"L" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10372">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10373">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10373">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10374">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10374">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10375">没有西班牙国家身份证的 14 岁以下的儿童居民：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10375">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10376">一个小写字母"K" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10376">one uppercase letter "K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10377">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10377">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10378">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10378">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10379">具有一个"中国"的标识号的"月号"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10379">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10380">一个大小写为"X"、"Y"或"Z"的大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10380">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10381">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10381">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10382">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10382">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10383">没有一个中国身份证号的身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10383">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10384">一个大小写为"M"的大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10384">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10385">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10385">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10386">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10386">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10387">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10387">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10388">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10388">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10389">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10389">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10390">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10390">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10391">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10391">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10392">找到一个  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10392">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10393">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10393">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10394">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10394">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10425">SQL Server连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10425">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10426">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10426">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10427">字符串"User Id"、"User ID"、"uid"或"UserId"，后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10427">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10428">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10428">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10429">字符串"用户 ID"、"用户 ID"、"uid"或"UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10429">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10430">1-200 小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10430">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10431">字符串"Password"或"pwd"，其中"pwd"不以小写字母开头</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10431">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" isn't preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10432">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10432">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10433">不是美元符号 ($) 、百分比符号 (%) 、大于符号 (>) 、符号 (@) 、引号 (") 、分号 (;) 、左大括号 ([) 或左括号 ({) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10433">any character that isn't a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10434">非分号 (;) 、正斜杠 (/) 或引号 (" ( 的任意组合) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10434">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10435">分号 (;) 或引号 (") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10435">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10436">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10436">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10437">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10437">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10438">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10438">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10439">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10439">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10440">正则表达式CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10440">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10441">未找到CEP_GlobalFilter关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10441">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter isn't found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10442">正则表达式CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10442">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10443">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10443">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10444">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10444">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10445">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10445">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10446">some-password</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10446">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10447">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10447">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10448">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10448">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10449">示例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10449">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10450">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10450">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10451"> (请注意，从技术上说，此敏感信息类型使用正则表达式（而不是关键字列表）标识这些关键字。) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10451">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10452">密码或 pwd 后跟 0-2 个空格、等号 (=) 、0-2 个空格和星号 (\*) -OR-</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10452">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) -OR-</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10453">密码或 pwd 后跟：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10453">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10454">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10454">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10455">小于符号 (<) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10455">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10456">大写或小写字母、数字、星号 (\*) 、连字符 (-) 、下划线 (_) 或空格字符的 1-200 个字符的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10456">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10457">大于符号 (>) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10457">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10458">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10458">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10471">瑞典驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10471">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10472">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10472">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10473">包含连字符的十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10473">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10474">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10474">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10475">包含连字符的十个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10475">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10476">六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10476">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10477">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10477">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10478">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10478">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10479">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10479">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10480">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10480">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10481">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10481">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10482">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10482">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10483">正则表达式查找  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10483">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10484">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10484">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10617">瑞典国家/区 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10617">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10618">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10618">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10619">10 个或 12 个数字和一个可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10619">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10620">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10620">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10621">10 或 12 位数字和可选的分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10621">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10622">两个数字 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10622">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10623">采用日期格式 YYMMDD 的六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10623">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10624">"-"或"+"分隔符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10624">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10625">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10625">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10626">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10626">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10627">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10627">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10628">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10628">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10629">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10629">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10630">该 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10630">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10631">找到来自 `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10631">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10632">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10632">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10633">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10633">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10634">该 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10634">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10635">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10635">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```
