## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10654">瑞典护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10654">Sweden passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10655">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10655">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10656">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10656">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10657">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10657">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10658">八个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10658">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10659">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10659">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10660">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10660">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10661">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10661">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10662">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10662">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10663">正则表达式Regex_sweden_passport_number找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10663">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10664">关键字或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keyword_sweden_passport` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10664">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10665">正则表达式查找 `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YY (01 JAN/JAN 12 格式的日期) 找到关键字 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10665">the regular expression `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` finds a date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (01 JAN/JAN 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10666">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10666">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10667">正则表达式Regex_sweden_passport_number找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10667">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10668">关键字或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keyword_sweden_passport` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10668">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10704">瑞典社会保险号或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10704">Sweden social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10705">此敏感信息类型实体仅在欧盟社会保险号或等效 ID 敏感信息类型中可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10705">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10706">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10706">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10707">不带空格和分隔符的 12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10707">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10708">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10708">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10709">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10709">12 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10710">对应于 YYYYMMDD (出生日期的八) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10710">eight digits that correspond to the birth date (YYYYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10711">对应于序列号的三个数字，其中：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10711">three digits that correspond to a serial number where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10712">序列号中的最后一个数字通过为男性分配奇数和偶数表示性别</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10712">the last digit in the serial number indicates gender by the assignment of an odd number for male and an even number for female</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10713">在 1990 之前，序列号的分配对应于该号码的承载人所在县。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10713">Before 1990, the assignment of a serial number corresponded to the county where the bearer of the number was born.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10714">或者 (1947 年 1 月 1 日根据税务记录) 在 1947 年 1 月 1 日，如果孩子在 1947 年 1 月 1 日之前 (通常 9 作为) 的第七个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10714">Or (if born before 1947) where they had been living, according to tax records, on January 1, 1947, with a special code (usually 9 as the seventh digit) for immigrants.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10715">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10715">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10716">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10716">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10717">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10717">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10718">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10718">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10719">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10719">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10720">该  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10720">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10721">找到一个  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10721">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10722">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10722">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10723">该  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10723">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10724">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10724">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10725">Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10725">Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10731">个人标识否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10731">personal identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10732">personnummer id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10732">personnummer id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10733">personligt id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10733">personligt id-nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10734">unikt id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10734">unikt id-nummer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10736">identifikationsnumret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10736">identifikationsnumret</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10737">personnummer#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10737">personnummer#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10738">identifikationsnumret#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10738">identifikationsnumret#</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10739">瑞典税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10739">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10740">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10740">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10741">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10741">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10742">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10742">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10743">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10743">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10744">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10744">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10745">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10745">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10746">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10746">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10747">10 个数字和指定模式中的符号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10747">10 digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10748">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10748">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10749">10 个数字和符号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10749">10 digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10750">对应于 YYMMDD (出生日期的六) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10750">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10751">加号或减号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10751">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10752">使标识号唯一的三个数字，其中：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10752">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10753">对于 1990 之前颁发的数字，第七位和第八位标识出生日期或外种人士的县</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10753">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10754">第九个位置的数字表示性别（对于男性或甚至对于男性）为奇数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10754">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10755">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10755">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10756">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10756">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10757">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10757">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10758">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10758">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10759">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10759">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10760">该  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10760">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10761">找到一个  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10761">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10762">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10762">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10763">该  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10763">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10789">SWIFT 代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10789">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10790">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10790">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10791">四个字母后跟 5-31 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10791">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10792">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10792">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10793">四个字母后跟 5-31 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10793">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10794">四字母银行 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10794">four-letter bank code (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10795">可选空间</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10795">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10796">4-28 个字母或数字（基本银行账号 (BBAN)）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10796">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10797">可选空间</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10797">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10798">BBAN 代码 (一到三个字母或) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10798">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10799">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10799">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10800">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10800">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10801">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10801">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10802">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10802">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10803">正则表达式 Regex_swift 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10803">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10804">找到 Keyword_swift 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10804">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10841">瑞士 SSN AHV 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10841">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10842">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10842">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10843">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10843">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10844">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10844">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10845">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10845">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10846">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10846">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10847">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10847">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10848">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10848">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10849">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10849">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10850">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10850">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10851">13 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10851">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10852">三个数字 - 756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10852">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10853">可选点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10853">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10854">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10854">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10855">可选点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10855">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10856">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10856">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10857">可选点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10857">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10858">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10858">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10859">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10859">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10860">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10860">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10861">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10861">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10862">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10862">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10863">函数Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10863">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10864">找到来自Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10864">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10865">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10865">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10866">函数Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10866">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10867">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10867">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_swiss_ssn_ahv_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10868">Keyword_swiss_ssn_AHV_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10868">Keyword_swiss_ssn_AHV_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10869">ahv</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10869">ahv</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10870">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10870">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10871">pid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10871">pid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10872">保险号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10872">insurance number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10874">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10874">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10875">个人 ID 号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10875">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10876">个人标识否。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10876">personal identification no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10877">insuranceno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10877">insuranceno#</span></span>

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10887">台湾地区身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10887">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10888">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10888">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10889">一个字母 (英语) 后跟九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10889">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10890">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10890">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10891">一个字母 (英语) 后跟九个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10891">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10892">一个字母 (英语，不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10892">one letter (in English, not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10893">数字"1"或"2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10893">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10894">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10894">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10895">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10895">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10896">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10896">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10897">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10897">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10898">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10898">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10899">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10899">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10900">找到 Keyword_taiwanese_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10900">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10901">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10901">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10902">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10902">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10903">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10903">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10904">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10904">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10905">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10905">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10906">Keyword_taiwan_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10906">Keyword_taiwan_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10907">身份證字號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10907">身份證字號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10908">身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10908">身份證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10909">身份證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10909">身份證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10910">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10910">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10911">身分證字號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10911">身分證字號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10912">身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10912">身分證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10913">身分證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10913">身分證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10914">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10914">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10915">身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10915">身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10916">國民身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10916">國民身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10917">簽名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10917">簽名</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10918">蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10918">蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10919">簽名或蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10919">簽名或蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10920">簽章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10920">簽章</span></span>   
   
## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10921">台湾护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10921">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10922">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10922">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10923">生物识别护照号码：九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10923">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10924">非生物识别护照号码：九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10924">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10925">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10925">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10926">生物识别护照号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10926">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10927">字符"3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10927">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10928">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10928">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10929">非生物识别护照号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10929">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10930">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10930">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10931">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10931">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10932">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10932">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10933">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10933">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10934">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10934">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10935">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10935">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10936">找到 Keyword_taiwan_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10936">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10937">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10937">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10938">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10938">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10939">ROC passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10939">ROC passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10940">Passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10940">Passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10941">Passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10941">Passport no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10942">Passport Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10942">Passport Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10943">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10943">Passport #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10944">护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10944">护照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10945">中華民國護照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10945">中華民國護照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10946">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10946">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span></span>
   
## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10947">中国台湾居民证书 (ARC/TARC) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10947">Taiwan-resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10948">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10948">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10949">10 letters and digits</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10949">10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10950">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10950">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10951">10 个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10951">10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10952">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10952">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10953">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10953">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10954">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10954">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10955">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10955">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10956">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10956">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10957">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10957">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10958">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10958">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10959">找到 Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10959">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10960">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10960">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10961">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10961">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10962">Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10962">Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10963">Resident Cert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10963">Resident Cert</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10964">Resident Cert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10964">Resident Cert.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10965">Identification card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10965">Identification card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10966">Alien Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10966">Alien Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10967">ARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10967">ARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10968">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10968">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10969">TARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10969">TARC</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10972">台灣地區居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10972">台灣地區居留證</span></span> 

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10973">泰语总体标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10973">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10974">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10974">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10975">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10975">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10976">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10976">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10977">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10977">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10978">第一个数字不为零或九</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10978">first digit isn't zero or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10979">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10979">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10980">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10980">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10981">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10981">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10982">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10982">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10983">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10983">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10984">函数Func_Thai_Citizen_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10984">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10985">找到来自Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10985">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10986">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10986">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10987">函数Func_Thai_Citizen_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10987">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10991">标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10991">Identification Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10992">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10992">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10993">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10993">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10994">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10994">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10995">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10995">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10996">土耳其语国家标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10996">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10997">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10997">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10998">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10998">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-10999">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-10999">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11000">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11000">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11001">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11001">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11002">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11002">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11003">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11003">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11004">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11004">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11005">函数Func_Turkish_National_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11005">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11006">找到来自Keyword_Turkish_National_Id的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11006">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11007">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11007">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11008">函数Func_Turkish_National_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11008">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11009">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11009">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11010">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11010">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11011">TC Kim都 no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11011">TC Kimlik No</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11013">Vatanda？ls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11013">Vatandaşlık numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11014">Vatanda？l？k no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11014">Vatandaşlık no</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11015">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11015">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11016">driver's license number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11016">driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11017">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11017">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11018">特定格式的 18 个字母和数字组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11018">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11019">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11019">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11020">18 个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11020">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11021">五个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字"9"来表示字母。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11021">Five letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11022">一个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11022">One digit.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11023">五个数字，日期格式为 MMDDY，表示出生日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11023">Five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11024">如果驱动程序是男性，则第七个字符将递增 50;对于考试，51 到 62，而不是 01 到 12。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11024">The seventh character is incremented by 50 if driver is female; for exampe, 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11025">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字"9"来表示字母。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11025">Two letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11026">五个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11026">Five digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11027">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11027">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11028">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11028">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11029">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11029">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11030">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11030">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11031">该 `Func_uk_drivers_license` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11031">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11032">找到一个 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11032">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11033">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11033">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11034">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其可信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11034">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11035">该 `Func_uk_drivers_license` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11035">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11036">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11036">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11157">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11157">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11158">滚动编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11158">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11159">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11159">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11160">两个字母后跟 1-4 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11160">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11161">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11161">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11162">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟 1-4 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11162">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11163">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11163">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11164">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11164">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11165">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11165">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11166">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11166">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11167">正则表达式 Regex_uk_electoral 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11167">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11168">找到 Keyword_uk_electoral 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11168">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11169">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11169">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11170">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11170">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11171">council nomination</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11171">council nomination</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11172">nomination form</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11172">nomination form</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11173">electoral register</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11173">electoral register</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11174">electoral roll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11174">electoral roll</span></span>

   
## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11175">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11175">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11176">national health service number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11176">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11177">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11177">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11178">10-17 个数字，通过空格分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11178">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11179">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11179">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11180">10-17 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11180">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11181">3 个或 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11181">either 3 or 10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11182">空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11182">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11183">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11183">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11184">空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11184">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11185">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11185">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11186">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11186">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11187">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11187">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11188">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11188">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11189">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11189">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11190">函数 Func_uk_nhs_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11190">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11191">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11191">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11192">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11192">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11193">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11193">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11194">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11194">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11195">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11195">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11196">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11196">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11207">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11207">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11208">GP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11208">GP</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11210">D.O.B</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11210">D.O.B</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11211">Date of Birth</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11211">Date of Birth</span></span>

## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11213">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11213">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11214">国家保险号码 (NINO) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11214">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11215">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家标识号敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11215">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11216">它作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11216">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11217">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11217">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11218">七个字符或九个字符，用空格或短划线分隔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11218">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11219">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11219">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11220">两种可能的模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11220">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11221">两个字母 (有效 NINOs 仅使用此前缀中的某些字符，此模式将对此进行验证;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11221">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11222">六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11222">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11223">"A"、"B"、"C"或"D" (前缀一样，后缀中只允许某些字符;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11223">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11224">或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11224">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11225">两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11225">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11226">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11226">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11227">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11227">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11228">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11228">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11229">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11229">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11230">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11230">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11231">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11231">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11232">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11232">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11233">"A"、"B"、"C"或"D"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11233">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11234">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11234">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11235">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11235">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11236">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11236">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11237">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11237">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11238">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11238">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11239">找到 Keyword_uk_nino 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11239">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11240">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11240">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11241">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11241">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. NINO -->
    <Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11243">Keyword_uk_nino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11243">Keyword_uk_nino</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11250">medical application</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11250">medical application</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11251">social insurance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11251">social insurance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11252">medical attention</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11252">medical attention</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11253">social security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11253">social security</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11254">great britain</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11254">great britain</span></span>

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11263">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11263">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11264">唯一的税务参考编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11264">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11265">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11265">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11266">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11266">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11267">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11267">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11268">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11268">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11269">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11269">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11270">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11270">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11271">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11271">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11272">不带空格和分隔符的 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11272">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11273">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11273">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11274">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11274">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11275">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11275">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11276">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11276">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11277">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11277">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11278">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11278">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11279">该  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11279">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11280">找到一个  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11280">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11300">美国银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11300">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11301">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11301">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11302">6-17 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11302">6-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11303">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11303">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11304">6-17 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11304">6-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11305">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11305">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11306">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11306">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11307">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11307">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11308">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11308">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11309">正则表达式 Regex_usa_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11309">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11310">找到 Keyword_usa_Bank_Account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11310">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11311">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11311">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_usa_bank_account"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11312">Keyword_usa_Bank_Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11312">Keyword_usa_Bank_Account</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11319">Checking Account No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11319">Checking Account No.</span></span>

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11340">美国驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11340">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11341">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11341">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11342">取决于州</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11342">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11343">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11343">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11344">取决于州 -例如，纽约：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11344">depends on the state - for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11345">格式为 ddd ddd ddd ddd 的九位数字将匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11345">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11346">九位数字（如 ddddddddd）不匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11346">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11347">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11347">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11348">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11348">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11349">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11349">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11350">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11350">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11351">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11351">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11352">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11352">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11353">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11353">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11354">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其可信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11354">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11355">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11355">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11356">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11356">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11357">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11357">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11358">未找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11358">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11445">Driver's Lic#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11445">Driver's Lic#</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11446">Driver's Lics#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11446">Driver's Lics#</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11447">Driver's License#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11447">Driver's License#</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11448">Driver's Licenses#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11448">Driver's Licenses#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11454">州缩写 (例如"NY") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11454">state abbreviation (for example, "NY")</span></span>
