## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11456">美国个人纳税标识号 (ITIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11456">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11457">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11457">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11458">以"9"开头且包含"7"或"8"作为第四个数字的九个数字，可选用空格或短划线设置格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11458">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11459">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11459">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11460">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11460">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11461">数字"9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11461">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11462">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11462">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11463">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11463">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11464">"7"或"8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11464">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11465">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11465">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11466">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11466">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11467">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11467">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11468">无格式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11468">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11469">数字"9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11469">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11470">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11470">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11471">"7"或"8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11471">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11472">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11472">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11473">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11473">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11474">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11474">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11475">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11475">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11476">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11476">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11477">函数 Func_formatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11477">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11478">找到 Keyword_itin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11478">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11479">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11479">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11480">函数 Func_unformatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11480">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11481">找到 Keyword_itin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11481">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11482">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其可信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11482">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11483">函数Func_formatted_itin或Func_unformatted_itin找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11483">The function Func_formatted_itin or Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
    <Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11484">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11484">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11485">Keyword_itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11485">Keyword_itin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11486">taxpayer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11486">taxpayer</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11487">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11487">tax id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11488">tax identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11488">tax identification</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11489">itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11489">itin</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11490">i.t.i.n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11490">i.t.i.n.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11491">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11491">ssn</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11492">tin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11492">tin</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11493">social security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11493">social security</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11494">tax payer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11494">tax payer</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11495">itins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11495">itins</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11496">所乘</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11496">taxid</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11497">individual taxpayer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11497">individual taxpayer</span></span> 


## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11498">SSN (美国) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11498">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11499">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11499">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11500">九个数字，可能采用格式化或无格式模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11500">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11501">如果在 2011 年中旬前发布，则 SSN 具有强格式，即数字的某部分必须介于某个有效的范围中（但是没有校验和）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11501">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11502">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11502">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11503">四个函数以四种不同的模式查找 SSN：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11503">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11504">Func_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前使用短划线或空格格式化的强格式的 SSN（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11504">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11505">Func_unformatted_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前未格式化为 9 个连续数字的强格式的 SSN (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11505">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11506">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后使用短划线或空格（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）格式化的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11506">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11507">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后未格式化为 9 个连续数字 (ddddddddd) 的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11507">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11508">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11508">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11509">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11509">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11510">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11510">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11511">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11511">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11512">函数 Func_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11512">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11513">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11513">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11514">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11514">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11515">函数 Func_unformatted_ssn 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11515">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11516">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11516">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11517">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其可信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11517">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11518">函数 Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11518">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11519">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11519">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11520">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 55% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11520">A DLP policy is 55% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11521">函数 Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11521">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11522">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11522">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11523">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11523">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11524">Keyword_ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11524">Keyword_ssn</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11525">SSA 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11525">SSA Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11527">社会保险#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11527">social security #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11528">社会保险#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11528">social security#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11529">社会保险否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11529">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11530">Social Security#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11530">Social Security#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11531">Soc Sec</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11531">Soc Sec</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11532">SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11532">SSN</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11533">SSNS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11533">SSNS</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11534">SSN#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11534">SSN#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11535">SS#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11535">SS#</span></span>

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11537">美国/英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11537">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11538">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11538">passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11539">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11539">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11540">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11540">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11541">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11541">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11542">九个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11542">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11543">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11543">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11544">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11544">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11545">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11545">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11546">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11546">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11547">函数 Func_usa_uk_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11547">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11548">找到或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11548">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11549">找到来自 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11549">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11550">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11550">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11551">函数 Func_usa_uk_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11551">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11552">找到或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11552">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. / U.K. Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11568">乌克兰护照国内</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11568">Ukraine passport domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11569">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11569">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11570">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11570">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11571">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11571">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11572">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11572">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11573">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11573">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11574">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11574">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11575">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11575">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11576">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11576">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11577">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11577">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11578">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11578">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11579">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11579">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11580">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11580">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11581">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11581">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11582">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11582">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11583">正则表达式Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11583">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11584">找到来自Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11584">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11594">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11594">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11595">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11595">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11596">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11596">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11597">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11597">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11598">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11598">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11599">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11599">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11600">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11600">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11601">八字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11601">eight-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11602">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11602">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11603">八字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11603">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11604">两个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11604">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11605">六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11605">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11606">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11606">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11607">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11607">No</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11609">如果 DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则其置信度为中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11609">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11610">正则表达式Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11610">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11611">找到来自Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11611">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11612">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11612">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ukraine_passport_international"></a><span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11613">Keyword_ukraine_passport_international</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11613">Keyword_ukraine_passport_international</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b3cb0-11618">номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b3cb0-11618">номер паспорта</span></span>
